 A plenty of bars for any taste are also appropriate for tourists, who are going to enjoy spending time there. vhe local owners of bars suggest that you should visit the origin Irish pubs and Mexican bars, trying to meet the travelers’ preferences. In the day time you can go sightseeing or have a rest in the aqua park, Water World, where you will enjoy serpentines, waterslides, whirlpools and other charms. You won’t be bored! 
","map":"place/spain,lloret-de-mar"}
name: spain-catalonia-lloret-de-mar

content:
{"annotation":" The main attractions of Thenerife in he first place are picturesque exotic landscapes, infinite kilometers of sandy beaches and comfortable hotels. It’s the resort of rich night life, entertainments for any taste and recreation for any age.
The oldest resort of the northern part of Tenerife is Puerto de la Cruz. Evergreen forests full of relic plants, vast banana groves as well as great climate and a spacious beach area  are the main gems of the city.
The municipal complex of Lago Martianes with lots of pools filled with pure sea water attracts numerous tourists who wouldn’t risk swimming in the unpredictable ocean. This complex was constructed by an architect Cesar Manrique and is affordable for almost everyone.
The collection of the Archaelogical Museum of Puerto de la Cruz will tell you about the historical past of the Canaries - about the Guanche culture (aboriginals of these places) and main features of the island’s character.
The main architectural attractions of Puerto de la Cruz are iconic buildings: All Saints Church and Church of Nuestra Señora de la Peña de Francia parishioners of which opened the Museum of Sacred Art thanks to their donations. The oldest Anglican cemetery on the island which was founded in the XVII century is now a sort of relic of the city.
Among the most popular places of Puerto de la Cruz there is a central square of Plaza del Charco and a well-known “Parrot Park” – Loro Parque, it’s an orchid garden and a great city botanical garden.
","map":"place/spain,puerto-de-la-cruz"}
name: spain-canary-islands-puerto-de-la-cruz

content:
{"annotation":" The large resort town on the Costa Daurada’s coast – Salou seems to be created for comfortable and interesting holidays - there are mild Mediterranean climate, warm sea,great beaches and many places of interest.
Along the central beach stretches the Boulevard of King Jaime I, enlightens the city landscape with wonderful fountains, palm walkway and flower beds. The mosaic street pathway is decorated with images of the noblemen’s coat of arms who glorified themselves in historical campaigns, it leads to a the monument of the country’s monarch.
Salou is well-known for its numerous fountains, including the Musical Fountain, the Illuminated Fountain and many ones without name - they decorate the modern city.
The Torre Vella defence tower or the Old Tower was built in the XVI century against pirate attacks and now is the cultural center of Salou. Different art exhibitions are held in it, also it hosts the Contemporary Enamel Art Museum, which invites tourists for a free excursion.
An iconic construction of the Middle Ages - the Church of Santa Maria del Mar of Salou is decorated with the coat of arms of the guild of sailors for whom that building was built in 1766. The wall mural by Josep Maria Guell and the paintings by Joan Garriga decorate the temple today and are very interesting for tourists.
","map":"place/spain,catalonia,salou"}
name: spain-catalonia-salou

content:
{"annotation":" The soft climate of the Mediterranean attracts a great number of foreign tourists to Spanish Ibiza each year. The sea, the sun and roaring night clubs are the main reasons why island’s resorts and the island itself are so popular.
The city of Sant Antoni de Portmany is famous for its magnificent sandy beaches, comfortable hotels and great entertainments for tourists from all parts of the world. Taking a vacation during the "club" season (from June to September) means bright loud parties, rich night life in the downtown and relaxing at the picturesque beaches of Sant Antoni.
Spring and fall are more silent that’s why families with children and couples prefer these seasons for peaceful rest and sightseeing.
Sant Antoni de Portmany is a great start to any tour across Ibiza. One could have a rest fromthe  bustling club life by going to one of the most beautiful caves in Spain – Can Marca Caves which served as a shelter for the Spanish smugglers more than a century ago. Today there is a museum with underground lakes and waterfalls, stalagmites and stalactites. It is equipped with safe terraces and illumination system.
An excursion to the local parish church of the XIV century, which looks rather exotic compared to the splendor of modern hotels, is great for privacy and taking a rest from roaring nights.
","map":"place/spain,sant-antoni-de-portmany"}
name: spain-balearic-islands-sant-antoni-de-portmany

content:
{"annotation":" For more than two and a half thousand years now, Seville has been situated in the lower reaches of the Guadalquivir River, which was praised in poems by Alexander Pushkin. Legend has it that this city, where the famous ardent seducer Don Juan and the proud gypsy Carmen lived, had been built by Heracles himself.
Seville is the capital of Andalusia, the most beautiful city of Europe. Since the day it was founded, it has been ruled by the Phoenicians, the Romans, the Arabs and the Normans. Since 1248 when Ferdinand III of Castile's army took Seville after a siege, it has been under the Spanish crown. The rule of extremely different cultures has greatly impacted on the visual image of the city.
The gorgeous  architectural sight of Seville is the Seville Cathedral which was under construction for more than a hundred years. The majesty of the Cathedral is emphasized by a grand dome and heavy columns. The cathedral’s belltower is the well-known the Giralda, a symbol of Seville which was built by the Arabs during their rule in the XII century. Facing the cathedral, there is The Plaza de Virgen de los Reyes, which overlooks The Alcázar of Seville, which used to belong to rulers of Mauritania, and then after the victory of Spain became the royal residence. The  Alcázar with its galleries, gardens, small paved courtyard, fountains, sculptures is for sure the gem of Seville.
The Torre del Oro (“Gold Tower”) is an ancient fortification of the Arabian city wall worth visiting. The place of the original burial of Christopher Columbus – The Monastery of Santa María de las Cuevas is also quite interesting.
Seville is one of the most hospitable European cities and flamenco (the passionate Andalusian dance) parties are its main beauty. But the most famous show in Seville is a bullfighting. Today in Seville and in Madrid only it is possible to see bullfighting - an integral part of the Spanish culture.
","map":"place/spain,sevilla"}
name: spain-andalusia-sevilla

content:
{"annotation":" Resorts of the largest Canary island – Tenerife - offer their guests either peaceful rest or bright and loud night life. Some cities of the island beautifully combine both of them: alternating between flashes of summer club life and calm periods of interseasons.
Most of island beaches are free; and fee for additional services is quite reasonable. Hotels of Tenerife are built to European standards and pamper their guests with pleasant surprises.
Among island’s attractions the most popular one is the San Miguel Castle, which was constructed specially for tourists in the style of medieval fortifications. The jousting tournaments are held in the tiltyard right in front of audience’s eyes. The knights in shining armors amuse the audience with difficult horseback stunts.
The bizzar shaped Auditorio de Tenerife invites guests not only as an architectural place of interest, but also as the best concert hall of the island. Operas and theatrical plays, evenings of chamber music, performances of local and visiting are held in the avant-garde bulding from the beginning of the century.
The architectural landmark of Tenerife is Teide National Park with the active volcano of the same name, rich flora and fauna. The ascent of the 3,5-kilometer-high volcano is considered to be a must-do for Tenerife’s tourists.
Guests of the island also visit other attractions with great pleasure: the Pyramids of Guimar and the eagle show in the Jungle Park, Basilica of Candelaria and picturesque La Orotava. Young and active people visit the best Tenerife’s night clubs.the century.
The architectural landmark of Tenerife is Teide National Park with the active volcano of the same name, rich flora and fauna. The ascent of the 3,5-kilometer-high volcano is considered to be a must-do for Tenerife’s tourists. Guests of the island also visit other attractions with great pleasure: the Pyramids of Guimar and the eagle show in the Jungle Park,Basilica of Candelaria and picturesque La Orotava. Young and active people visit the best Tenerife’s night clubs.","map":"place/spain,tenerife"}
name: spain-andalusia-tenerife

content:
{"annotation":" The beach resort of Torremolinos is a gem of the Mediterranean coast of Costa del Sol. Despite the small size of the town, there is a lot for numerous tourists to look at and for families with kids to do.
The main attractions and entertainments of Torremolinos, hotels and bars of the city are located in the center. The two largest beaches of the resort are Carihuela and Bajondillo, both of them covered with gray volcanic sand. There is a horseback riding school and a golf course in the city.
The crocodile farm is an exotic local attraction. Terrible reptiles of different breeds and sizes only two meters away from the audience is a part of the show in the Crocodile Park.
In the Montemar district, at the place where the coastal defence, which protectectеd residents against enemies from the sea, used to be,  nowadays there is  the La Baterna Park.It will be interesting for visiting for both adults and children.
The aquapark, the largest in Costa del Sol, the center of water rides is also near Torremolinos and is consisted of numerous waterslides along rapids and jacuzzi, tropical lagoons and and pool games.
During walking tour through the small picturesque street San Miguel tourists learn habits of life of locals, national traditions and local cuisine. At the end of September there is a main city holiday - St. Michael’s Day. There are lots of  songs, dances, fairs and sport competitions on this day.
Night life of Torremolinos flourishes in bars and night clubs of the city. The most popular places are El Palladium club, "Dream" and "Kiss" bars, the drag queen show are also very popular.
","map":"place/spain,torremolinos"}
name: spain-andalusia-torremolinos

content:
{"annotation":" Three hundred sunny days a year, warm climate, amazing beaches, historical monuments, terrific holidays – all of this is Valencia, the third-largest city in Spain by population and the capital of the province with the same name.
The city used to belong to Romans, Greeks, Arabs, and, eventually, has become the city with incredibly beautiful combination of Mauritian and Christian styles of architecture. In 1238 James I of Aragon besieged the city and the Mooors’ garrison of 50 thousand men surrendered.
Such architectural monuments as the Bell Tower “El Miguelete”, the well-known Quart Towers, the Torres de Serranos, The Water Tribunal of the plain of Valencia are well preserved. Today each Thursday in the Water Tribunal the meeting is held – it’s the most ancient democratic self-government body in Europe. The government of the autonomy nowadays sits at the great Palacio de  la Generalitat which was built in the XV century.
Another city attraction is the The Metropolitan Cathedral–Basilica of the Assumption of Our Lady of Valencia. It has an octagonal tower and there is an agate bowl which is considered to be the one true Holy Grail, the very one which was on the table at Jesus Christ’s Last Supper.
The foobridges connect the Cathedral and the Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados where thousands of candles burn in front of the sacred image of the patroness of Valencia – Virgin Mary. Valencia rightly bears the name "sleepless Valencia" (Vivir Sin Dormir) because it’s one of the main centers of night life in Spain. Numerous entertainments in night clubs, bars, shows and discos complemen uncountable city holidays which are considered to be the most colorful and loudest in the country.
","map":"place/spain,valencia"}
name: spain-valencia-autonomous-community-valencia

content:
{"annotation":"This Scandinavian country traditionally attracts visitors. Tourists choose respectable Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmo or Sweden ski resorts. 
 Everywhere you can find variety of entertainment and services for children.  In Stockholm it is a museum of Astrid Lindgren, wonderful Swedish writer. Here you can climb up on a horse of Pippi Longstocking and visit her villa “Chicken”. Tourists with children should go to the amazing museum Vassa, where medieval ship raised from the seabed has found his refuge. It is the only one ship of those times survived to this day. 
Many tourists being in Stockholm visit the museum of Abba. 
 It is essential to go to the Galma Stan island, where there are the main attractions of the city – the Royal Palace and medieval streets. Guests of the city like to watch the ceremonial changing of the guard. In one of the courtyards of Galma-Stan a sculpture of a tiny boy standing, townspeople love it and even make tiny clothes for it. 
Here, in the old town there is a house of Lillebror, a friend of Carlson. Malmo is the capital of the farm region. This is a neat little town with lots of parks and gardens.
Sweden is a friendly country with lots of interesting places. However, you must be prepared to cash expenses, as in Sweden there is a high standard of living.
","map":"place/sweden"}
name: sweden

content:
{"annotation":" Capital of Sweden – Stockholm is one of the most beautiful cities in northern Europe. This city was founded on 14 islands of the Baltic Sea more than 700 years ago. In Stockholm there are many historical monuments, telling about the greatness of the kingdom of Sweden.
In the capital of Sweden there are 3 objects included in the UNESCO World Heritage List, tourists definitely should visit them. These are Drottningholm Palace, home to the royal family, woodland cemetery Skogskyrkogården known for its architectural objects and archaeological zone on the island of Björkö, where the ancient viking settlement is located.
Besides these objects, in Stockholm you should visit Riddarholm Church, the oldest building in the city built in the 13th century and Stockholm City Hall with a high tower, which has an observation deck. Erickson-Globe - Sports Arena of spherical shape, the largest structure of its kind in the world. St. Klara’s Church with the tallest tower in the city.
Stockholm is famous for its museums – there are over 80 in total. The most popular are National Museum of Sweden, which represents more than 45 000 exhibit items, Museum of Modern Art, which collects the works by Picasso and Dali and Skansen, the outdoor museum, which collects the buildings from different regions of Sweden. Additionally, it is worth to visit Stockholm City Museum, Nobel Museum, Army Museum, Nordic Museum and the Museum of the Middle Ages.
","map":"place/sweden,stockholm-county,stockholm"}
name: sweden-stockholm-county-stockholm

content:
{"annotation":" Switzerland is a state located in the center of Europe. It is actively visited by tourists for sightseeing. The country is unique in its diversity, mixing of peoples and languages.
The capital of the Federal Republic is Bern with noticeable landmark – Zeitglockenturm clock tower. It is a symbol of the city. Old medieval town demonstrates the genius of architectural accuracy of its creators and fascinates its visitors. 
 Lausanne in the neighborhood of Lake Geneva is the most beautiful city of Switzerland and the capital of the canton Vaud. Notre Dame Cathedral and the late Gothic town hall, Beaulieu Castle and Church of St. Francis are noteworthy attractions, and you should see them. 
 The city is good for walking in the recreation zone of Mon Repos or Elysian Park. Geneva is famous for the quarter of international organizations. There are the International Organization of Labor and Employment, the International Red Cross with its main office, European office of the United Nations, the Council of Churches. 
 Tourists particularly mention the Saint Pierre Cathedral. This cathedral is a kind of analogue of Vatican for Catholics, esteemed by Protestants.
Switzerland surprises by its huge natural park. Deep canyons, scenic lakes Neuchatel and Leman (Geneva), Lugano and Biel, Reichenbach and Rhine falls. It will be inexcusable omission to come to the country and do not visit the “Swiss Riviera”.
","map":"place/switzerland"}
name: switzerland

content:
{"annotation":" Geneva is the second largest city in Switzerland. This is a major world financial center. In addition, in the city there are the main headquarters of various world organizations, including the Red Cross, European office of the United Nations, the European Organization of Nuclear Research.
In the city there are many historical attractions. One of the main of them is the St. Peter’s Cathedral, which is located in the historic center of the city on the left bank of the Rhone. Construction of the Cathedral began in 1160 and was continuing for 150 years. And on the right bank of the river there is the Palace of Nations – a complex of constructions built in the 30s of last century. Until 1946 there was the headquarters of the League of Nations.
In Geneva there is Reformation Wall – a monument dedicated to the leaders of the Protestant Reformation. The wall has a length of about 100 meters and there are statues of great reformers. It is located on the territory of the University of Geneva.
The famous Museum of Modern Art “Petit Palais” also is located in Geneva. Here you can see works by Picasso, Dali, Renoir and many other famous artists. In Geneva there is one of the largest fountains in the world – Jeu d’Eau with height of about 140 meters.
Maybe it will be interesting to someone, but the Large Hadron Collider is also in Geneva.
","map":"place/switzerland,geneva-canton,geneva"}
name: switzerland-geneva-cantongeneva

content:
{"annotation":" The largest city in Switzerland – Zurich is located on the shore of Lake Zurich. This city is a world financial center, and it contains the headquarters of many international insurance and financial companies.
In Zurich there are a lot of attractions. Guests of this city definitely should see Grossmünster – the biggest cathedral, Fraumunster – former female abbey founded in 853, and St. Peter's Church – the oldest church of the city with huge clock tower (its diameter is 8.7 meters and the minute hand has a length of 4 meters). These three churches have played an important role in the religious life of the city.
Town Hall holds a special place among the historical monuments of Zurich, it was built in the 17th century, and in that place many crucial decisions for the city and the country have been taken.
In Zurich there are more than 50 museums, the most famous among them are Kunsthaus and the Swiss National Museum. In Kunsthaus there are great collections of works by Alberto Giacometti and Edvard Munch, this museum is one of the largest art museums in Switzerland. The building of the Swiss National Museum was built in 1898. Museum building, perfectly preserved to the present day, is one of the most beautiful buildings of the Old Town. And inside the museum on the four floors the exposition presents the history of Switzerland. Other popular museums of the city are Museum of Dinosaurs, Museum of Trams, Museum of Toys, the Museum of Vine-growing and the collection of Fund of Emile Boulet.
","map":"place/switzerland,zurich-canton,zurich"}
name: switzerland-zurich-canton-zurich

content:
{"annotation":" The colonial name of Taiwan – Formosa, is translated from Portuguese as “beautiful island”. Indeed, there are as much as 6 national parks on such a relatively small island with an area of 36,000 square kilometers.
On the island there are mountains of Alishan, where waterfalls, lakes and rivers are located. There is a tree of east cherry, which age is estimated at 3000 years. Its height is about 52 meters, and diameter – 23m. At an altitude of 2650 meters there is Sun Moon Lake located next to the settlement of Shao nation. You can see their ancient rituals, taste the local food and buy interesting souvenirs.
In the city of Hualien, located on the Pacific coast, performances of whales are often arranged. In addition, lovers of active recreation will enjoy Hualiene. Coastal waters are very clean and lovers of diving will definitely like them.
The capital of Taiwan –Taipei, is very rich in attractions. Here are the memorials to Chiang Kai-shek and Sun Jansen, these are huge architectural complexes made in the traditional Chinese style. You definitely should visit the oldest temple of the city Longshan, built in the middle of the 18th century. In the city there is skyscraper Taipei 101, which height with the spire is 509 meters, it is the third rate among all structures in the world. It is very interesting to visit the National Palace Museum, Fine Arts Museum and Zoo.
Taiwanese cuisine is very similar to Chinese ones – rice, noodles and vegetables dominate in a menu. Much attention is paid to seafood, especially to shrimps. Also in Taiwanese dishes you can often find exotic ingredients such as meat of dogs, snakes, and all kinds of insects.
","map":"place/taiwan"}
name: taiwan

content:
{"annotation":" Tanzania is a fairly large state located in the east of the African continent. This country is attractive to tourists because of the large number of national parks and wildlife reserves.
The most popular form of recreation in Tanzania is safari. The Serengeti Park is home to many wild animals, including antelopes, zebras, giraffes, lions, elephants, hippos and about 500 species of birds. On the territory of the reserve there are many hunting lodges where you can have a comfortable rest.
In another park Ngorongoro there is a huge crater in area of about 600 sq.km., and very special flora and fauna has formed here. In the reserve you can find the rare black rhinos, cheetahs, lions, buffaloes and elephants.
In Tanzania there is the highest peak in Africa –Kilimanjaro, which is very popular among climbers. Also, visiting this country, you can see the three great African lakes – Nyasa, Victoria and Tanganyika.
Lovers of the sea holiday will like snow-white beaches of Zanzibar and Pemba. On these islands there are comfortable hotels, which are on border of the corners of unspoiled wild nature.
Dar es Salaam is the capital and the largest city in Tanzania. In this city many interesting buildings from the colonial past has preserved. Among the main attractions – Clock Tower, Palace of the Sultan Majid, Askari Monument, Church of St. Alban. It is very interesting to visit the Village Museum, which houses the national dwelling of different regions of the country, as well as National City Museum and Art Gallery Nyumba ya Sanaa. In Dar es Salaam there is the famous fish market, where you can buy all sorts of seafood, and large market of spices.
","map":"place/tanzania"}
name: tanzania

content:
{"annotation":"Paradise, a country of smiles and freedom, the best place for tourists – all these words are for Thailand. Once touching its fascination, you are no longer possible to get rid of the feeling of something incredible. Attractions of Thailand present a kaleidoscope of emotions and pleasant experiences. But before you see them, you should make acquaintance with local residents. Thais are amazing people. They are smiling, laugh often, and at that, without malice and sarcasm. Thais' aspiration to the beautiful can be felt while visiting attractions. Politeness is iconic quality of local residents. In Thailand it is not accepted to be nervous or anxious. And health is a thing, which each Thai strives to. Many tourists should learn to live by the same principles to achieve harmony.
Not only people amaze, cities and islands are full of surprises as well.
In Bangkok, tourists visit the numerous temples, Royal Palace. It is concentration of elegant, ancient architecture.
Pattaya attracts by number of interesting places: Elephant Village, Big Buddha Hill, Bottle Museum, Crocodile Farm and other. There is lively nightlife, and on beautiful beaches you can truly relax.
Phuket island attracts by its natural sights. Sirinat National Park, Aquarium, Butterfly Garden, Snake Farm are places where it is easy to lose head by the charms of flora and fauna.
Every corner of Thailand, from Krabi to Samui, is a kaleidoscope of exotics, amazing nature, sandy beaches and fabulous entertainment.
The Land of Smiles is open to acquaintance.
","map":"place/thailand"}
name: thailand

content:
{"annotation":"Founded in the XVIII century as a small trading port and today the capital of Thailand – Bangkok – the biggest city in the country. The city is glorious by its monuments of culture and architecture. Hundreds of peaked Buddhist temples and palaces rise above the streets of the city, which are cut by innumerable threads of channels. Thousands of modern vehicles and ships are found side by side with cozy English-style parks. Oriental colour is subtly interwoven with the achievements of European civilization.
The historic center of Bangkok is adorned by the main attraction of the city – the Grand Palace, the Residence of the monarchs in Thai style. The palace complex consists of several luxury buildings, the Library and the Mausoleum, which stores the remains of the royal family of Thailand. Near the palace there are carved ceremonial swing Lak Muang made of teak wood.
North Gate of Residence leads to Wat Phra Kaew – Temple of the Emerald Buddha – a sacred place of Thais. The figure of Buddha seated on the golden altar made from a single block of jade is the mascot of Thailand and a place of pilgrimage for many visitors.
Five-ton statue of Buddha on the white stone altar made of pure gold decorates another sight of Bangkok – Temple of the Golden Buddha. Eyes of 3-meter god are made of sparkling sapphires and pearls. Millions of Buddhists from all over the world visit the famous temple annually.
Friendly Thais welcomes guests of the city telling about attractions of Bangkok, among which there are 400 magnificent temples, huge planetarium, art and cultural centers of the city, museums, hotels and markets. The capital of Thailand is one of the most attractive cities in the world for tourists.
","map":"place/thailand,bangkok-province,bangkok"}
name: thailand-bangkok-province-bangkok

content: {"annotation":" Chiang Mai is the second largest and most important city in Thailand after the capital. The city is known as the ancient historical and cultural center of the country and is very popular among tourists. The main attractions of Chiang Mai are its temples. There are about 300 in total. The most famous and visited temples are Wat Phrathat Doi Suthep located at an altitude of 1600 meters, Wat Chiang Man, the oldest temple of the city built in the early 13th century, it houses Buddha statue made of jade, the temple complex of Wat Phra Singh, where there is the precious Buddha Phra Sing. Also it is interesting to visit temples Wat Sri Suphan, Wat Chedi Luang and Wat U-Mong. The central part of the city is made in the form of square and surrounded by the wall with bastions of the 17th century. The city has many interesting architecture, summer royal residence Phuping is considered as one of the main architectural attractions of Chiang Mai. There are a lot of interesting places around the city. In the vicinity of Chiang Mai there are “Elephant Village” and “Orchid Farm”. And besides, a lot of original tribes live there. One of them is Karen tribe, in which there is a very unusual concept of female beauty. Local men find attractive long neck, so all the girls from childhood extend this part of the body with copper rings.","map":"place/thailand,chiang-mai-province,chiang-mai"}
name: thailand-chiang-mai-province-chiang-mai

content:
{"annotation":"  Kathu District is located in the central part of the largest island in Thailand – Phuket. This district is famous for its beaches and infrastructure.
The main resorts of district are Kata, Karon and Patong. Beach of Kata is very popular among surfers. They come here from May to October. The fact is that in this time strong winds blow constantly, which raise high waves. In the rest of the year mostly couples with children have a holiday here.
Patong is very popular among young people. There are many cafes, night clubs, massage parlors and spas. Also active leisure is very common here – you can go diving, sailing, water skiing and fishing.
Karon is rightfully considered as the best resort in Kathu. There is a huge beach, which length is more than 3 km. The beach is very clean and well-groomed, and grating white sand gives it a special charm. Grating sound arises due to a large amount of quartz contained in the sand.
In the Kathu district the cascading waterfall of the same name is located. It is situated in the middle of the rainforest and amazes by its beauty and splendor. Kathu Waterfall is considered as one of the main attractions both of the district and the whole island of Phuket.
","map":"place/thailand,kathu"}
name: thailand-phuket-province-kathu

content:
{"annotation":" Samui is an island located in the Bay of Bengal. This place is very popular among tourists who wish to spend their vacation enjoying the beautiful nature, clear waters of the Bay of Bengal and sandy beaches.
The best beach on the island is Chaweng. It has a length of 6 km, and is located on the east coast. There are white sand and crystal clear water on the beach. Besides Chaweng, the beaches of Lamai, Maenam, Bophut are very popular among tourists.
On Samui there are several beautiful Buddhist temples. The most frequently visited by tourists are Wat Phra Yai temple, where there is a statue of Buddha of 15 meters high, and Wat Khunaram Samui, there is a glass sarcophagus with a mummy of monk, who was former abbot of the temple and a great master of meditation. Also you should see pagoda Laem Sor Samui, which roof is made of yellow tiles.
On the island there is the aquarium, which presents a lot of tropical fish, corals and turtles. It is also interesting to visit Tiger Zoo, which is home to Bengal tigers and leopards, butterfly garden and nearby insect museum.
And one of the main attractions of the island is the rocks “Grandma and Grandpa”, which have such names because there are very similar to the male and female sex organs. Cliffs are located near Lamai Beach.
","map":"place/thailand,ko-samui"}
name: thailand-surat-thani-province-ko-samui

content:
{"annotation":" Sea province of Thailand – Krabi is located in the Andaman Sea and includes more than 130 islands. The capital of the province is the city of the same name with a population of about 18 000 inhabitants, in contrast to the westernized resort towns, life goes steadily and quietly there in accordance with Thai tradition. 
In the province there are many resort towns, the most famous of them are Ao Nang, the noisiest and most frequently visited by young people, there you can go windsurfing and snorkeling, Phi Phi, where there are hot springs and quiet, Hut Rey Le – the perfect place for a quiet family holiday. Also Hat Tham Phra Nang is very popular, it is possible to get there only by boat, there are many rocks and caves, as well as a magnificent lagoon Phra Nang.
One of the main attractions of the province is the “Tiger Cave”. It is located 9 km from Krabi town and cave paintings depicting tigers were found in it, as well as many ancient artifacts, cast of Buddha’s footprint, tools and pottery.
Island’s cuisine presents traditional Thai dishes, in which rice, seafood and blend of spices dominate. Interestingly, in Thailand it is common practice to eat with a spoon and a fork and chopsticks are served only at Chinese Restaurants.
","map":"place/thailand,krabi-province,krabi"}
name: thailand-krabi-province-krabi

content:
{"annotation":" Pattaya is the most famous resort in Thailand. It is on the second place after capital of the state, Bangkok, by the amount of tourists. The main “perk“ of Pattaya is a lively nightlife with lots of entertainment, so mostly young people come here, lovers of a relaxing family vacation will unlikely enjoy here.
But despite the fact that Pattaya is primarily associated with nightclubs, developed sex industry and many cafes and restaurants there are many interesting places in the city where you can have the time of life during the daylight hours.
Near the city there is Tropical Botanical Garden, the largest in Thailand, Nong Nooch, in which on the territory of more than 600 acres there are orchid garden, cactus garden, garden of water plants, elephant farm and hill of butterflies. In addition, the park has a large collection of ferns and palms.
To the south of the city there is the temple complex of Wat Yansangwararam, the statue of Big Buddha is located there, and around it there are the statues of Buddha on weekdays. And on Mount Khao Chi Chan there is cliff image of Buddha with a height of 105 meters.
It is also interesting to visit the zoo of tigers “Si Racha”, crocodile farm, coral island Koh Lan and water park located on the territory of the hotel “Pattaya Park”.
фa","map":"place/thailand,phatthaya"}
name: thailand-chon-buri-province-phatthaya

content:
{"annotation":"The largest island of Thailand – Phuket is the most popular Asian and global resort, a paradise for lovers of exotic holiday on the coast of the ocean. Scenic tropical forests with cool waterfalls, colorful coconut plantations and landscape parks make it especially attractive.
Among the attractions of Phuket, first of all, it is worth to note the Old Town. Tourists admire colorful graceful buildings, looking like toy houses from fairy tales, on the quiet Sino-Portuguese streets. Cafes, restaurants, residential houses, made in the Chinese style, – all fascinates and attracts camera lens here.
Landmarks of Phuket are its numerous temples and pagodas, among which Cholong Wat is probably the most visited. As the spiritual center of Phuket and its hallmark, Cholong is a construction of several pagodas, elegantly decorated with colored glass elements.
A huge statue of the Big Buddha gazes serenely at the city from the heights of the hills Nakkerd. The majestic 45-meter sculpture is visible to almost whole southern part of Phuket.
All who loves to plunge into a whirlwind of abandoned hilarity hurry to Bangla Road after dark, where they plunge into local clubs and bars. The famous Simon Cabaret on the Patong Beach offers guests bright night entertainment program. Great show featuring transvestites, rich music program, bright costumes and illumination are noteworthy, because they are an integral part of the culture of Phuket.
","map":"place/thailand,phuket-province,phuket"}
name: thailand-phuket-province-phuket

content:
{"annotation":" Travelling to Tunisia is a lot like traveling in time. Tourists shouldn’t expect to see rich-furnished hotels, attraction places or well-arranged modern beaches. Tunisia doesn’t offer much of exotic flora and fauna either. But those who are tired of everyday routine and willing to see the antique past of Byzantic empire, the Medieval culture and French government formation, would be impressed by Tunisia.
 The ruins of the ancient cities, temples, fortresses and forts, invaluable antique sculptures, ancient settlements, unusual Arab markets and mosques are the main places of interest in this resort country. It’s easy to recollect in memory the Aladdin’s story while looking at the Tunisias’ streets and merchants’ behavior. It’s always important to check the change and to keep money and papers far from strangers’ eyes. After trying the traditional meal which is tuna and green tea, you can take a Carthage tour. The magnitude of amphitheatre ruins, mystery of Saint Loius Cathedral and imperial thermaes are breathtaking. A walk to the Bardo National Museum, to Torbet el Bey Mausoleum or Al-Zaytuna Mosque will be very impressive too. The divine Temple of Juno Caelestis in an ancient Dougga town is famous for its legends. The Citadel dedicated to the three godss and the ruins of the ancient amphitheatre are here too. It’s worth to pay some attention to Sidi Bou Said, Arab settlement offering spectacular views of the Gulf of Tunis. The mysterious city of Douz opening the gates to the Sahara Desert is very interesting place to visit too. The monument of the key (“the gate to the desert”) towers in the suburb of the city. The Colosseum, Tunisians’ national treasure, takes place in the El Djem city. It exceeds by size its’ Roman analogue.
 The North coast offers the beaches of the coral reef. They are filled with picturesque rocks and reefs. It is impossible to describe all the sights of Tunisia.
","map":"place/tunisia"}
name: tunisia

content:
{"annotation":"Resort Hammamet belongs to the city of Tunisia, which combine traditional oriental flavor (Medina Hammamet) and modern comfort of the new center (Medina Yasmine). Clear boundaries really separate two times and two worlds from each other by stone walls of 300x100 meters length.
Great Mosque of Medina (Mosque of Olives) with the minaret of a rectangular shape relates to the main attractions of the old center. Construction of the thirteenth century is the spiritual center of the city, which attracts tourists and lovers of history. According to legend, the mosque was built on the place, where formerly the sacred olive tree grew, so it is auspicious for spiritual development. The entrance is allowed to Muslims only.
Ancient Spanish fort of Ribat, dating from the XII century, adjoins to the territory of Medina from the coast. Square-shaped fortress with walls of 13 feet high, watch tower and the one entrance serves as a museum now and is open for tourists. On the territory of Ribat there is also the mausoleum of Sidi Bouali, warrior monk; courtyard of the fort is laden with old cannons, and the walls offers a beautiful view of the city and the bay.
Connoisseurs and lovers of ancient times are attracted primarily by the ruins of the ancient city Pupput, the ancestor of the modern Hammamet, destroyed in the XIV century by Catalan pirates. Remains of columns, houses, Roman baths and mosaic paintings, adorning the walls of dwellings of the Byzantine Empire period, have miraculously preserved here to this day.
One of the amusement parks of Hammamet, the water park “Flipper” or the zoo “Friguia” are perfect for a family vacation.
","map":"place/tunisia,al-hammamat"}
name: tunisia-nabul-al-hammamat

content: {"annotation":"The small town of Tunisia – Monastir is located on the Mediterranean coast and attracts tourists by the possibility of inexpensive but comfortable beach holiday combined with cultural entertainment and observing of historical attractions. It is able to maintain authentic atmosphere of the town and its eastern flavor, because the tourist area was removed beyond its borders. Visiting Medina – the old part of the city is a prerequisite for all travelers of Monastir. Major monuments of architecture and culture of the historic center are Grand Mosque, built in the IX century, Museum of Traditional Costume, well-preserved fortress Ribat, an example of medieval Islamic architecture with intricate labyrinths of passages, corridors and halls. Mausoleum of the country's first president, Habib Bourguiba is another architectural landmark. Wide alley, on either side of which there is the city cemetery, leads to a solid building with gilded dome and two low minarets. Inside the building there are sarcophagus Bourguiba and his family and museum with the personal belongings of the President. It is noteworthy that the President himself began the construction of his own tomb and planned it very carefully. For active recreation Monastir offers magnificent world class golf courses, riding school at the ranch Skanes, rocky underwater reefs and grottos of shallow available even for novice divers.","map":"place/tunisia,al-munastir,monastir"}
name: tunisia-al-munastir-monastir

content:
{"annotation":" A great many of people heard much about vacation in Turkey, but not everyone knows about all its features. You can buy travel packages to this amazing country not only in summer. Turkey is a mountainous country and there are great resorts for lovers of winter sports. Uludag, Palandoken and Saklikent welcome tourists from November to March. During warmer months traditional beach holiday is more customary.
Full bathing season in Turkey continues from April to October. Besides it is possible to plan the most suitable type of holiday. Belek or Side is the best solution for a holiday for families with children. For young and energetic tourists it will be more interesting to stay in Bodrum, where the biggest disco in the country is located.
The main attribute of the summer holidays – beaches. They are perfectly clean in Turkey. Many of the beaches are marked with the "Blue Flag", sign of European Commission on the Environment. The most famous are Konyaalti and Lara. It is quite possible to combine holyday and treatment. In Kangal, Yalova and Bursa you can do courses for restoration of the locomotive system, gastro-intestinal tract or nervous system.
Having been in Turkey it is necessary to visit the attractions of the country. Goynuk Canyon, which is considered one of the most beautiful places of the country, fascinating spectacular Duden waterfalls near Antalya, Kappodokiya, the place where Star Wars or legendary Troy movies were shot. They all deserve equal attention.
Local cuisine is no less famous, or rather, Turkish sweets. Turkish delight with pistachios, coconut or almond, sesame or peanut halva, sherbet, nougat, honey baklava and many other things. Turkey is a really amazing country. It is ready to generously share its secrets with everyone who visits it.
","map":"place/turkey"}
name: turkey

content:
{"annotation":" Turkey can turn any boring vacation into a dream. Antalya is especially worth visiting. This city is the main resort of the country. And it attracts those who look for different kinds of experince on their holidays. Today it is possible to walk quite enough in the old streets exploring the sights, and tomorrow – to go to the beach, lounge near the pool, have fun in a modern nightclub.
Turkey attracts many tourists. This country is full of interesting places, and Antalya was not an exception. Here there is the longest underground aquarium in the world. Every day tourists admire more than 10 thousands of sea creatures. Hıdırlık Tower and the ancient Hadrian's Gate are especially noteworthy. Don't pass up going there Kaleici district. It is also referred to as a miniature Turkey. Constructions from different eras located here boggle the imagination. You can enjoy cultural wealth of the Antalya Museum. And visit to the “Mini-City” Center will provide you an opportunity to see all the sights of the country in one place, albeit in a reduced form.
Residents of the “second capital of Turkey” are hospitable; they are always polite and happy to meet new people. But tourists should make allowances for religious features of the local people and to behave in an appropriate manner previously learning the rules of Turkish etiquette.
","map":"place/turkey,antalya-province,antalya"}
name: turkey-antalya-province-antalya

content:
{"annotation":"Located at the crossroads of East and West, Europe and Asia, Islam and Christianity, the former stronghold of the Byzantine Empire, Istanbul keeps in his heart many architectural, cultural and historical monuments.
The historic city center is decorated with its main attraction – the Topkapi Palace, built for the Sultan and his family in the XV century on the site of the Byzantine acropolis, in relict olive grove. It is a palace complex with a variety of luxurious buildings connected by terraces.
History of majestic building – Hagia Sophia numbers about 15 centuries, although it was built of many-colored marble during less than 6 years by outstanding Byzantine architects. Today, the splendor of Sofia is open for tourists and attracts visitors from all over the world.
In the western part of Istanbul, in the endless maze of shopping alleys, there is the main market of the city – Kapali Carsi, the most exotic place in Turkey. Founded in the XV century, today the “Big Market” is the most visited attraction of Istanbul. Here you can buy souvenirs and antiques, bijouterie and jewelry, silk and carpets.
You can admire the breathtaking view of the city and Bosphorus strait from Galata Tower, which is located on the north shore of Golden Horn waterway. Historically, this district of Istanbul was inhabited by foreigners. The modern city has still preserved its former European chic.
Istanbul is bright, dynamic, and unique city of mosques and roses, bustling markets and stone bridges.
","map":"place/turkey,istanbul-province,istanbul"}
name: turkey-istanbul-province-istanbul

content:
{"annotation":"Manavgat, like most of Turkish cities, is a city with a venerable age and interesting history. Despite its small size, it can surprise even the most wordly-wise traveler with a great experience.
In 3 km from Manavgat there is a scenic waterfall of the same name, which is considered as the main attraction of this place. Stream with width of 40 meters, falling from the height of two meters and surrounded by green forests, is a bright colorful performance.
In the upper reaches of the river, forming a waterfall, large Oymapinar Dam is built, a powerful hydraulic structure of Turkey. Tourists like to visit this place, admiring the beauty of the surrounding area, order fresh trout at the local restaurant.
Lovers of extreme sports will definitely go in the National Park of Turkey – Köprülü Canyon – an area popular among fishermen and lovers of rafting. Those who wish can go canoeing down the Manavgat River to the sea, sailing along caves and grottoes on the emerald river-banks. Above the deep gorge there is a small stone bridge, preserved from the II century – the construction of the ancient Romans.
Hiking or biking in the healing pine forests of the reserve probably will appeal to fans of ecotourism. Active travelers can also visit the cave Altinbesik with its small picturesque lake and karst formations.
","map":"place/turkey,manavgat"}
name: turkey-antalya-province-manavgat

content:
{"annotation":"Turkish resort pearl – the town of Marmaris is located at the foot of wooded hills on the shore of the sunny bay on the southwest coast of the country. Tourists, coming to the city, have a unique opportunity, bestowed by nature itself. They can swim in the waters of two seas – the Mediterranean and the Aegean, because Marmaris is located on the border of their confluence.
The main reminder of the ancient past of the city is the ancient but well-preserved fortress built during the time of Ottoman domination. Carved stone battlements of the fortress walls clearly silhouette in the sky over the old part of Marmaris. Heavyweight watchtower of this construction offers scenic views of the bay and the city. In the eastern part of Marmaris on a small hill there is the main city water park – Aqua Dream, gigantic inscription, made in the style of Los Angeles “Hollywood”, informs tourists about it.
Nearby there is the most popular walking area of the city – the Street of Bars, where tourists have fun with pleasure in the numerous bars and restaurants of Marmaris, become acquainted with the features of the national cuisine of the country. The modern leisure complex with discos, shops, bars and cinemas is a favorite vacation spot of guests from different countries.
Local market has become a kind of attraction of Marmaris, which offers to buy interesting things: souvenirs and jewelry, textiles and porcelain, oriental sweets and carpets. Easy relaxed atmosphere of the city makes staying in it comfortable and pleasant. Exotic of the East leaves vivid impressions from that holyday for a long time.
","map":"place/turkey,marmaris"}
name: turkey-mugla-province-marmaris

content:
{"annotation":"The small resort town of Oludeniz, which is located on the south-west of Turkey, is called by many people as the most exotic place of the country. Located on the Mediterranean coast in a picturesque bay, it is protected from the sea waves and cold streams by the long sandy spit.
The coastline of the town is occupied by the magnificent modern beaches and attracts primarily lovers of measured beach holiday. There is a national nature reserve of Turkey with the eloquent name “Blue Lagoon”.
Since Oludeniz is surrounded from three sides by mountains with comfortable steppingstones of different levels, it is used by sportsmen paragliderers from different countries for training and competition. In autumn the village gathers many visitors from different countries: participants and spectators of colorful competitions in aerial acrobatics. Experienced pilots from Germany, France, England, Turkey surprise guests of town by dizzying stunts.
Conquerors of the mountains and lovers of active recreation also will find entertainment to their liking and enjoy the magnificent scenery of the village from the height of Babadag – the highest mountain in Oludeniz. Lovers of beautiful can take a walk to the Valley of Butterflies, with a visit to the ruins of the ancient Greek village, old chapels and picturesque little houses.
Hotels of Oludeniz are mainly low cost, 3-star, with the municipal beaches. In recent years several luxurious tourist complexes with a high level of comfort and vast territories have appeared in the bay.
","map":"place/turkey,oeluedeniz"}
name: turkey-mugla-province-oeluedeniz

content:
{"annotation":" Ukraine presents picturesque and originality, brightness and hospitality. The country has abundant history rich in both solemn and tragic events, natural and man-made objects of unique beauty. Sights of Ukraine are well known even beyond its territory.
In Ukraine there are number of religious monuments directly related to the Russian history. It is the capital St. Sophia Cathedral and the Kiev Lavolta of the Caves, and the main street of Kiev – Khreschatyk. Ukrainian history is also replete with important events, many of which are reflected in the landmarks preserved until now. They are Arsenal and the National Museum in Lvov, palaces and catacombs in Odessa and museums in Kharkov.
National symbols are represented well in the sights of Ukraine. This country is associated with them around the world. Unique monument of Dumpling erected in Poltava, it reflects the hospitality and cordiality of the Ukrainian people. And songs "The sailor’s brigade" and "Seafood" in Odessa show that people have a great love of the sea and close relationship with it.
Sites of Ukrainian cities are tightly intertwined with their history and modernity. There is no doubt that they should enrapture not only locals but also tourists.
","map":"place/ukraine"}
name: ukraine

content:
{"annotation":"We can talk about the glorious city on the banks of the Dnieper River infinitely long, and you will need yet more time to visit all the interesting places of Kiev, architectural and historical monuments, palaces, squares and museums.
One of the main attractions of the capital of Ukraine and the Orthodox shrines of the country is the monastery complex in the heart of the city – the Kiev Lavolta of the Caves. Unique place with temples of the XI century, functioning monastery, museums, princely tombs and miraculous icons. The relics of Orthodox saints and the salt of the earth are stored here.
The main street of Kiev – the famous Khreschatyk is a corner of the capital, which oddly combines architectural styles, ancient Slavic traditions and modern innovative trends. The famous St. Andrew's Church looks at the ancient city from the height of the Starokyivska Mountain. It is single-domed church of the Baroque style, the only one surviving building in the capital by master Rastrelli.
Sophia Cathedral meets the guests of Kiev – the most ancient temple of the capital, which is open both as a museum and a parish. The cathedral holds the remains of many great people – there is the sarcophagus of Yaroslav the Wise and his wife. Frescoes and mosaics, preserved on the arches and the central dome of the building from the XI century, decorate Sophia with a palette of 170 colors.
Every tourist will find something interesting for himself in the numerous museums of the city. Guests of Kiev attend with interest National Artistic and Historical Museums, Museum of Medicine and Russian Art, Museum of Bulgakov, and Museum of Water.
","map":"place/ukraine,kyiv-city,kiev"}
name: ukraine-kyiv-city-kiev

content:
{"annotation":"Formerly a developing country, today is in the list of the world's richest countries. Here nature is combined with a high standard of living. Arriving in the UAE, pay attention to the flora. Many beautiful trees and flowers, and the tourist cities allow learning more about Emirates.
Capital Emirate – Abu Dhabi presents guests luxurious oasis cities and streets where sheikhs live. Here you can stroll in a sunny green park, and in the evening – walk along the skyscrapers with beautiful fountains. At 150 km from here there is Al Ain. Here you will see the ancient fountains located next to the museum near the rock of Jebel Hafeet. You should definitely visit the big tombs Healy. Then go to the zoo of oasis city, where you can see the aquarium filled with rare species of fish and marine animals, which can be found only in Arabia.
If you have your holiday with children, you should visit the village of pearl divers in Al Shindagha. In Dubai you can participate in competitions at festivals and then go for a walk around the park in the Palace of Sheikh Al- Sharaf. In the morning go shopping at the Friday Market in Fujairah. Fights between bulls are held there. And in Ajman see camel races. It will be a real holiday for you and your child.
","map":"place/united-arab-emirates"}
name: united-arab-emirates

content:
{"annotation":"Precious Pearl on the shore of Persian Gulf – Dubai is the most populous city in the United Arab Emirates. Founded more than a millennium ago as a small fishing village, today it is the largest commercial and tourist center of the world. It amazes guests by magnificent architecture and entertainment industry and offers many opportunities for interesting and rewarding holiday.
Burj Khalifa, 828-meter-high building with the world's highest observation deck, which is located on the 124th floor, is rightfully considered as the main attraction of the city. Two floors below there is famous restaurant “Atmosphere” – the highest in the world. Foot of the tower is decorated with dancing fountain, spurting at 150 meter height. In Dubai there are plenty of hieratical constructions and mosques. Near the old market of the city the famous Grand Mosque stands – the center of religious life in the city. It is easily recognized by the 70-meter minaret and is one of the main attractions of the emirate.
Low trading fees of Dubai allows guests of the city to make a bargain in many shopping centers and markets. International Trade Centre of Dubai is another hallmark of the city, the building of 39 floors, which hosts the most important marketing exhibitions of the country.
Luxury house of Sheikh Saeed and Dubai Museum, Spice Market and the famous “Golden” market, parks Al Mumzar and Jumeirah with modern entertainment complexes should be noted among the most popular places in the city. Dubai is also known as a center for the organization of major international exhibitions and business conferences.
","map":"place/united-arab-emirates,dubai-emirate,dubai"}
name: united-arab-emirates-dubai-emirate-dubai

content:
{"annotation":" Great Britain is a wonderful combination of ancient traditions and innovations, old historical sites, green parks and valleys. British like no other people guard their nature and ancient buildings, new architectural structures are not widespread. Most people firmly associate the UK image with Big Ben and the Tower of London. However, there are many other exciting attractions.
Big Ben, of course, is the most known to us. Clockwork, which has been running in the tower since 1859, still keeps time. Huge Clock of Westminster – the largest four-edged chiming clock in the world. It has original symbolic and architectural details. The Tower of London – the main symbol of the country is very ancient and mysterious. Fortress complex is listed as UNESCO site today.
Tower drawbridge located in London is recognizable by thousands of people who even have never seen it. Drawing of the bridge becomes a real full house in the city.
Stonehenge is monolithic architectural monument, consisting of stone blocks weighing from 25 to 82 tons. Although the author of the project and its purpose still remain unknown, Stonehenge is visited by many tourists. It emanates amazing energy.
One of the oldest castles in England – Windsor is still being used for ceremonies and meetings of the royal family. It has been the main country residence of monarchs since the 11th century.
","map":"place/united-kingdom"}
name: united-kingdom

content:
{"annotation":"The city with centuries of history, the capital of the county of Somerset, beautiful place of elegant England on the River Avon – Bath is famous to the world since ancient times. Thanks to the healing mineral springs the city was the unofficial capital of the British public life for the longest time, since the cream of the English aristocracy comes here for treatment and rest.
At the end of the XVIII century the remains of the famous Roman baths were found in the city, and since that time they are the main attraction and heritage of Bath, beholden to them for even its name (Bath). This finding eventually became a museum, and mineral springs found in the city are recognized as unique, having no analogues in the world. Today you can taste healing water of springs in the restaurant, which is open at the museum.
At various times Bath was visited by the famous writers Daniel Defoe, William Thackeray, Charles Dickens. As well as modern travelers, they visited attractions of Bath: church of the abbey and the town hall, observed Kingston Square and museums of the city. Among the latter the most interesting are: Fashion Museum, museum dedicated to a sweet roll (with the obligatory free tasting), Museum of Astronomy and East Asian Art with a rich collection of fine porcelain from the Orient.
In addition, Bath is famous for being the site of action of the two famous novels of Jane Austen “Persuasion” and “Northanger Abbey”. Tourists can visit the favorite places of the heroines of novels, walk along the streets as described in the writings.
Favorite places to walk among local residents are Sydney Garden and Victoria Park. The guests of Bath also visit city theaters and clubs, markets and maneges. Some monuments of the Classical period are recognized as UNESCO World Heritage Site.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,england,bath"}
name: united-kingdom-england-bath

content:
{"annotation":"  A popular English seaside resort Bournemouth is located at the English Channel shore. The first settlements appeared here in 1810, and since then with the development of rail transport every summer Bournemouth was visited by thousands of Londoners.
The main attraction here is famous  "sandy beaches of Bournemouth". White sand and clear water make this place one of the best resorts not only in Britain but also in Europe. The water at Bournemouth beaches is much warmer than in other places in England due to the location in a special micro-climate region. Besides coastal cliffs in front of the coastline hide it from cold winds. 
 Bournemouth is also famous for the Russell-Cotes Museum, which contains interesting exhibits collected by the founder of the museum - Sir Merton Russell-Cotes during his trips abroad. In addition, the museum building is preserved in its original form since 1897. 
 Another tourist attraction is a large aquarium with hundreds of sea creatures that is worth visiting. 
 Bournemouth is very popular among young people, so there are dozens of night clubs, the most famous of which are Chilli White, Lava & Ignite, "V" and Bliss. And one of the most popular entertainments in the city is considered to be the "Bournemouth Eye" – going up to the height of 120 meters in the balloon basket.","map":"place/united-kingdom,england,bournemouth"}
name: united-kingdom-england-bournemouth

content:
{"annotation":"  Brighton is a resort city situated in the south of England. The city is located on the shore of the English Channel and is famous for its pebble beaches, nightclubs, restaurants and boutiques. 
 Brighton acquired the glory of the fashionable resort in the late 18th century. It was then that this city was visited by the King-to-be George IV, and in the 1810-ies the Royal Pavilion was built there at his command. Nowadays the Royal Pavilion is the main historical attraction in Brighton. In 1849, the building was purchased by the municipality of the city, and nowadays it is a museum. 
 Among other architectural monuments of the city, we can name the St. Bartholomew’s Church, one of the largest churches in the UK. Another city sight is the unusual railway invented by the engineer Magnus Wolf in the late 19th century. The rails were laid on the seabed, and the vehicle was placed on the platform, which was connected to the wheels with long steel beams. Because of the fact that the system resembled a spider it was unofficially called “Daddy Long Legs”. 
 In Brighton, there are several unusual museums – like a fishing museum and a toy museum. Also it would be nice to visit the City Museum and the Art Gallery.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,brighton"}
name: united-kingdom-england-brighton

content:
{"annotation":" Bristol is the most famous port of the British Empire. For a long time this city was a sea gate of the country, but in this regard it was replaced by Glasgow and Liverpool in the 19th century. From the Bristol’s berth one of Johnathan Swift’s protagonists Gulliver started his travel. 
 One of the most visited places in Bristol is the Clifton Suspension Bridge. The bridge was built by the engineer Brunel over the Avon gorge in 1836 – 1864. The total length of the bridge is 230 meters and the length of the gorge is 190 meters. From the bridge you can enjoy a beautiful city view. 
 The main historic attraction of the city is Bristol Cathedral. The foundation stone of this magnificent building was laid in 1140 and it is still there. Also in Bristol you can visit the St. Mary Redcliffe Church built in the 15th century, which has long been considered to be the tallest building in the city and the St. Mark's Church, dating back to the 13th century. 
 Bristol was badly damaged by German air raids during  the World War II, so many buildings and monuments have been irrevocably lost. And among undamaged works of architecture, you can find the Theatre Royal, Cabot Tower and Bristol University’s building. 
","map":"place/united-kingdom,bristol"}
name: united-kingdom-england-bristol

content:
{"annotation":"  Despite the fact that the history of Cardiff had began in the first century AD, it became the capital of Wales only in 1955. Today it is the largest city and the largest port of Wales with a long history. 
 First of all, Cardiff is famous for its castles. Cardiff castle was built by the Romans about 2 thousand years ago. It acquired its present form during the Norman conquest of England in 1091. Another great castle is Castell Coch (or Red Castle) built in the 13th century and rebuilt in the 19th century. It is well-preserved till now due to the skill of Welsh architects. A few kilometres away from Cardiff there is an open-air museum – Cosmeston Medieval Village. There you can learn more about the life of medieval Welsh.
Among churches worth visiting we can name the Cardiff Norwegian Church, built in the 19th century, St David's Cathedral , dating back to the 12th century and the oldest St John the Baptist Church. Other most visited attractions include Cardiff City Hall, National Museum and Art Gallery. Cardiff parks, such as Roath, Cathays and Bute Park are popular among tourists, as well as the Millennium Stadium that can accommodate 74,500 people. 
a","map":"place/united-kingdom,cardiff"}
name: united-kingdom-wales-cardiff

content:
{"annotation":" The first mention of the town of Edinburgh dates back to the times of the Roman Empire. The exact date is unknown, but in the first centuries of our era, the Votadini built a fortress, which was located on the territory of the modern city, and named it Din Eidyn –  Eidyn’s Hill Fort. Nowadays Edinburgh is also associated with a fortress, although this one was built in medieval times – the famous Edinburgh castle.
 The Edinburgh castle is the main city attraction, located on the top of the Castle Hill. For a long time this impregnable fortress was considered to be "the key to Scotland". The castle is a home to one of the oldest buildings in Scotland – St. Margaret’s Chapel. Exactly at 1 PM every day, but on Sundays, a cannon is fired from the Mill’s Mount battery.
 One more Edinburgh attraction is the Royal Mile. The Royal Mile is 4 streets that follow each other from west to east. Various parades and festivals take place here. And practically every building has a century-old history. The former Scottish Parliament, St. Giles’ Cathedral, the People’s Story Museum, and the Bank of Scotland are located here. Edinburgh is also a home to the 60-meter-high monument of writer Walter Scott. It looks like a chapel  and  is located near the Edinburgh Waverley railway station.
 When visiting Edinburgh, don't forget about the popular Scottish drink – whisky. There is even a whole museum devoted to it, which is located on Castlehill Street - a part of the Royal Mile.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,edinburgh"}
name: united-kingdom-scotland-edinburgh

content:
{"annotation":" Glasgow, the largest city in Scotland, was founded in the late 6th century, and it’s no wonder that this city is crowded with tourists all the time. According to the legend, the city was founded by a Christian missionary St. Mungo, who founded a monastery there. Now at the place of former monastery there is St Mungo's Cathedral, which is the oldest building in Glasgow. 
 To other historic sights of the city belong the Clock Tower, the Tron Theatre built in 1529, and the Tolbooth Clock Tower. Later architectural monuments of the city include City Chambers, Templeton’s Carpet Factory, former Gardner’s Warehouse, Caledonian Road Church, St.Mary’s Cathedral and The Greek Orthodox Cathedral of St. Luke. 
 Glasgow is famous for its museums. The most popular is Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum; it contains works of Rembrandt, Van Gogh, Manet, Rubens, and many other masters. The Burrell Collection holds more than 9.000 artefacts from ancient China, Egypt, Greece and Rome. In the Gallery of Modern Art the best works of best contemporary artists are collected, including Andy Warhol and David Hockney. 
 Going to Glasgow be sure to visit the parks of this city. There are about 70 of them in Glasgow, but the most popular is Glasgow Green, founded in the 15th century, Kelvingrove Park, where the abovementioned art gallery and the Botanic Gardens are located. In the Botanic Gardens you can find rare plants from all over the world.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,glasgow"}
name: united-kingdom-scotland-glasgow

content:
{"annotation":" English city of Leeds, West Yorkshire's largest city, is known not only due to the Yorkshire Terrier and the famous football club Leeds United. 
 There are many attractions that are worth seeing. First and foremost, you should see the Leeds Royal Armouries collection, which contains more than 75,000 exhibits. Here one can find weapons from all over the world, that belong to the early Middle Ages. 
 In Leeds there is a very beautiful town hall, built in 1852. There you can find the largest three manual Organ in Europe.
 Among other historic sights of Leeds you should pay attention to Harewood House restored in the 21st century and Kirkstall Abbey. Both of these architecture gems were built in the 12th century. 
 In the city you can find a very interesting museum to visit - the Thackray Medical Museum, one of the largest greenhouses in the UK - Tropical World, and Thwaite Mills Watermill Museum, located in a working mill. Art museums of Leeds are also popular among tourists, for example Leeds Art Gallery or Yorkshire Sculpture Park. They collected a large number of John Atkinson Grimshaw’s works, a famous English artist born in Leeds.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,leeds"}
name: united-kingdom-england-leeds

content:
{"annotation":"When we say the word Liverpool, the Beatles band and the football club of the same name certainly come to mind. Indeed, in this city there are many things, which both football fans and Beatles fans should see.
Fans of “Fab Four” should definitely visit the Cavern Club, where musicians began their career, as well as the museum of the band, which presents a variety of exhibitions devoted to creative activities of Beatles.
In Liverpool football fans should visit the famous Anfield, it is a home stadium for 18-time champion of England, and a 5-time winner of the UEFA European Cup – the Liverpool Club. Anfield is considered as the most “singing” stadium in England and that is the place where there is the world famous football tribune “The Kop”. Among the architectural sights of Liverpool the administrative buildings of Liverpool Port should be noted, they are included in the UNESCO World Heritage. Also the Liverpool Anglican Cathedral is worth a visit, it is considered the largest Anglican cathedral in the UK. The city has many monuments, the most famous of which are the Wellington's Column and Nelson Monument erected in 1813.
In Liverpool there is a branch of the Tate Art Museum, which houses a large collection of modern art. Also the Maritime Museum and the Museum of Liverpool are very popular among tourists.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,liverpool"}
name: united-kingdom-england-liverpool

content:
{"annotation":" Resort city of Llandudno is located in north-western Wales. Although a settlement already existed here in the 13th century, urban development began in the 50s of the 19th century, when the architect Williams suggested turning Llandudno into the resort center. Since then the town has persistently held the title of “Queen of Welsh resorts”.
Residents of Llandudno are very proud of the fact that Charles Dodgson (who took the author's pseudonym Lewis Carroll) told his incredible stories to little Alice Liddell exactly in their city. That's why one of the main attractions of the city is the Alice in Wonderland Center. In the cave where it is located there are figures of the characters of Lewis Carroll in full size. Also the city preserved building of the Gogarth Abbey hotel, which served as the summer residence of the Liddell family.
But the main historical attraction of Llandudno is considered as the Saint Tudno's Church, which was built of stone in the 13th century. It is situated on a picturesque hill in the Great Ormes Head nature reserve. In addition there is a beautiful town hall in the city, which is worth a visit.
Unlike many modern resorts Llandudno seems a bit prim. Calm and unhurried atmosphere takes you to the previous century. In those days, when horse-drawn carriages drove on the streets and locomotives arrived to the train station. This is the unique charm of Llandudno.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,llandudno"}
name: united-kingdom-wales-llandudno

content:
{"annotation":" London is the capital of the Great British Empire, the city, in which each square kilometer has several attractions. This city is a stronghold of British traditions: the royal guards, double-deckers, red telephone boxes – all of this is in London.
There are so many attractions in London that in order to see all of them it is necessary to move here to live for a little while. But among them there are some which are worth a mention.
In the first place is a symbol of the city – Big Ben, a huge bell located in the clock tower. Besides the famous Tower of London – one of the oldest buildings in England. Westminster Abbey, where majority of British monarchs was crowned. Residence of the English Bishop – Saint Paul's Cathedral. Buckingham Palace, where the Queen of England resides. Trafalgar Square – the main square of the country. All of these sites are listed as UNESCO World Heritage.
In London there are more than 240 museums, but the most popular among tourists are: the British Museum – the second most visited museum in the world, the Museum of Madame Tussauds, the London National Gallery, which has collected more than 2000 show-pieces of Western European painting, the largest museum of British art – Tate. And besides them Sherlock Holmes Museum, Imperial War Museum, Museum of Public Transport and many others.
Among the parks of London, Hyde Park is considered as the most visited. Park in area about of 1.4 square km is a favorite place to have a rest both for Londoners and visitors.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,london"}
name: united-kingdom-england-london

content:
{"annotation":" Center of Northern England, weaving capital of the world, the concentration of nightlife, and parent of world-famous football club “Manchester United”. All of this is Manchester – the city, which is worth visiting to all who choose to visit the UK.
Transport infrastructure is developed well, so there are no problems with observing of numerous attractions. Wonderful view of the city is visible from the Manchester observation wheel. You should visit the historical part, there you can see Cathedral, Town Hall, University of Manchester, Public Library. And in St. Anne’s church wedding ceremonies are always held on Saturdays.
Right in the center of the city there is a piece of East Asia – the local Chinatown offers tourists excellent Chinese cuisine. And young people are attracted by the numerous nightclubs such as Protection, Via Fossa, Velvet and others.
You will admire futuristic Trinity Bridge and Parsonage Gardens, where you can walk for hours. Lovers of antiquity and olden time lost in admiration after visiting the archaeological park Castlefield, City Art Gallery, Military Museum and so on.
Manchester is able to surprise, it literally makes a mash on anyone who is lucky enough to visit it.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,manchester"}
name: united-kingdom-england-manchester

content:
{"annotation":" South Coast of England is justifiably proud of one of the popular seaside resorts, which is called Torquay. This city attracts tourists with its mild climate, long coastline with cypresses, pines, palms, friendliness of local people and the mass of interest.
The city stands on seven hills, which allows residents and visitors to enjoy amazing panoramic views. There are many green fields, beautiful shores, villages, hills. Torquay safely can be called a modern resort, elegant, full of fun, but mindful of the past.
The main attraction of the city – Kent Cavern. It is located nearby. This cave is the official oldest architectural landmark in the world. Golfers will be delighted to visit the Torquay Golf Club. The world of fauna can be seen in the Living Coasts.
The city has an international quay and the old harbor. Contemporaries turned it into a parking for numerous expensive pleasure and sport yachts. This view is exciting. City life is closely associated with the sea and sailing.
Torquay is worth visiting because it has the warmest climate in the country. It is the best place for vacation.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,torquay"}
name: united-kingdom-england-torquay

content:
{"annotation":" North of England doesn’t usually attract tourists a lot. But there are places that are worth seeing. York City amazes by its beauty, it has a rich history and was born before the days of the Roman Empire. Here there are the mass of the buildings, which are recognized as the oldest in Europe. A trip to this city is a real gift for those who stand in awe of history.
Tourists know that they definitely should visit Minster. This Gothic cathedral is the greatest in the country. It is worthy to walk along the city walls, see Clifford's Tower, and quarter Shambles consists entirely of medieval houses.
You can move around the city by public transport, but it is much better to do it on bicycles. There are countless bicycle trails, paths, rental centers, parking lots.
York is a paradise for lovers of shopping. In the center there are mass of boutiques, department stores, and rare items can be found in Shambles. The city is also known for its universities and the Chocolate Factory. 
 You should visit York Cathedral, Jorvik Viking Centre – a museum, which stands on the site of archaeological excavations.
York is a mixture of ancient and modern, in this city you can plunge into incredible atmosphere, which touches everyone's feelings.
","map":"place/united-kingdom,york"}
name: united-kingdom-england-york

content:
{"annotation":" United States is a huge country, which attracts tourists with its romance, energy, democratic character. Only  United States combine such a number of traditions,  ethnicities, ideologies, cultural differences. The Hollywood Walk of Fame, the Statue of Liberty, Disneyland have become symbols of the country. A huge number of natural and artificial attractions amazes.
The Grand Canyon, areas of Florida and Louisiana, the Great Plains of Nebraska, deserts of Arizona – all of this is interesting in its own way.
Attention of tourists is drawn to the historical monuments of the country – Mesa Verde National Park, the National Mall, Mount Rushmore. Freedom Tower or One World Trade Center, the Chrysler Building, the Golden Gate Bridge, the Guggenheim Museum are the unique architectural sites. Yellowstone National Park, the Grand Canyon, Zion National Park, Valley of Fire State Park are the most famous national parks of the country.
States of Delaware, Malibu, Miami along with Niagara Falls, Central Park in New York, Glacier National Park are the perfect places for nature lovers! In addition, tourists are always amazed by clear rivers and lakes overrun with fish, wonderful canyons, healing hot springs. At the same time Americans will surprise you by their respect for the environment and excellent level of service.
The USA will amaze all and sundry, because history of this country is distinctive and eclectic!
","map":"place/united-states"}
name: united-states

content:
{"annotation":" The beautiful city of Albuquerque is situated in the south-west of the USA and is the most populated city in the state of New-Mexico. People call Albuquerque "the city of balloons" because each year it hosts the hot air balloon festival. Albuquerque is the only place in the world which offers nine days of sky filled with hundreds of colourful hot air balloons. They can take any shape, from flowers to animals to cartoon characters.
