After this fiesta, Albuquerque doesn't forget about the balloons; even on Christmas Eve the city is lit by their smaller paper copies. Also, if you want to learn more about this tradition and balloons themselves you can visit the museum of Anderson-Labruzzo. 
Other sights of Albuquerque are the San Felipe de Neri Church, which is the oldest bulding in the city, and the Sandia Peak tramway. It's easy to guess that this tramway leads to the top of the Sandia Peak, but it's not easy to take one's eyes off the magnificient view, or to miss one of those little restaraunts which offer the delicious local cuisine. 
Albuquerque is not just a city; it's a whole system of interconnected areas. One of them is Corrales, a village where people have remained true to the traditions of Latin American farmers. The local Indians also remember from time to time - each yeae actually - who their ancestors were, and gather somewhere not far from Albuquerque to show off their magical (perhaps) tricks and national souvenirs. 
Albuquerque is an ancient town; it was founded by Spanish settlers in the XVIII century. Among the remains of that epoch are narrow streets, pavements, romantically dark alleys, stone bridges and old suburbs. Albuquerque is crossed by the greatest of parks of the Rio-Grande Vale. Thousands of people choose this place to walk or go to picknicks. The animals in this park have got used to people, so be ready to take photos of rabbits, beavers, geese and many other mammals. Just like people, they enjoy the sunny and dry climate of Albuquerque. It's never cold there, so it's no wonder that every day there is at least couple of tourists in Albuquerque.
","map":"place/united-states,albuquerque"}
name: united-states-new-mexico-albuquerque

content:
{"annotation":" Anaheim is a city located in Orange County, part of the Los Angeles metropolitan area, California, USA. The city was founded more than century and a half ago by immigrants from Bavaria, Germany. By the way, "Anaheim" in their language means "a house on the Saint Anna river". In the beginning of the XX century locals started to grow oranges (Orange County, remember?),and their agricultural community quickly prospered. However, in the middle of the same century a person named Walt Disney bought land in Anaheim and made this land Disneyland, the first entertainment park of its kind. After two years of construction (1953-1955) the gates of the magic castle opened for all children and parents. Nowadays, Disneyland is the most popular entertainment park in the word. 
Tourists have become fond of Anaheim thanks to its sport and entertainment facilities. In the course of few last decades parks, amusement rides, gaming and sporting grounds had been built in plenty. The king of Anaheim's attractions is, again, Disneyland. The word is not accidental; Disneyland is indeed a kingdom with its own administrative division. Each part of the park is dedicated to a certain kind of amusement, or to a popular piece of culture, or to some random theme. There are the Main Street, Land of Fantasies, the New-Orleans Square, Land of Pioneers, Land of Tomorrow and special areas for fans of Indiana Jones, Pirates of the Carribbean, Tarzan and other characters from movies and cartoons. And at this variety doesn't deplete: there also are golf courses, tennis courts, hippodromes, sport arenas and tracks for rentable roller skaters and bicycles.
In 1993 Anaheim saw the grand opening of the sport complex "Anaheim Arena". In 2006 Honda acquired naming rights, and the complex became "Honda-center", but the essence didn't change: the place continued to host events of various kinds. Fans of sport may remember the World Badminton Championship in 2005 and Stanley Cup Finals in 2007, while fans of music know that many singers and bands have been to Anaheim. Among them, Davd Bowie, Aerosmith, Shakira, Depeche Mode, Mariah Carrie, Phil Collins, Madonna, Celine Dion, Metallica, Britney Spears, The Kiss, Barbara Streisand, Justin Timberlake, Christina Aguilera, The Rolling Stones, Jennifer Lopes and many others. In addition to that, "Honda-center" is a home arena of the local professional hockey team "Anaheim Ducks". By the way, it was Walt Disney's company that founded the club. So, everything is interconnected in the glorious city of Anaheim.
","map":"place/united-states,anaheim"}
name: united-states-california-anaheim

content:
{"annotation":" Travel America does not always include a visit to Las Vegas or New York. Small towns, which are ready to share their story, are also sightworthy. Arlington is exactly such a town. This medium-sized city is located in the state of Texas. It is famous for the magnificent baseball team called “Texas Rangers”.
Arlington is interesting for tourists visiting the United States of America, because it gives an opportunity to get acquainted with the culture and the way of life of small towns of the country. It is quiet and peaceful, there is no hurry, and local people extend a warm welcome to their guests.
An interesting feature of the city – there is no public transport in Arlington. It is the largest city in the world marked by such nuance. Attractions of Arlington are the pleasant surprise. Theme park “Six Flags Over Texas” is a vivid expression of the state history. Here all the amusements are made in an appropriate manner. This city is also considered to be the capital of the bowling. Here there is the main office of this association, the Hall of Fame and an impressive museum. It is also worth to visit the Arlington Theatre.
This is not the most popular city in the country, but there is some charm in it, which everyone should touch.
","map":"place/united-states,arlington"}
name: united-states-texas-arlington

content:
{"annotation":"It's no coincidence that in America there are dozens of states. Each of them is noteworthy for tourists. North Carolina is not an exception. This is the place, where there is a small town called Asheville. Life flows peacefully and quietly in it, because its population is less than 100 thousand inhabitants.
Tourists not too often come purposefully in this city. But it has its own charm and is worthy of attention. Visit Asheville means to get acquainted closely with the culture of modest size American cities, get to know the traditions of the local people, enjoy visiting interesting places.
Awesome construction – Biltmore Estate Palace. Architectural features of this building are amazing. Pointed towers, spacious courtyard decorated with a miniature pond with fountain, velvety lawns – all of this creates a feeling that you see a royal palace. Lovers of art should visit the museum called Folk Art Center. Here you can see a lot of interesting exhibits. And theatergoers will duly appreciate Fine Arts Theater. And though its dimensions are small, but for lovers of Melpomene there is always something to see. Asheville is a humble corner of the great country, but it has something that leaves an imprint in the hearts of people.
","map":"place/united-states,asheville"}
name: united-states-north-carolina-asheville

content:
{"annotation":"The capital of Georgia American state is recognized around the world as one of the business centers. But at the same time, Atlanta is ideal for vacation. Now it is a modern city hosted the Olympic Games in 1996. The architectural appearance of Atlanta is very expressive. It combines both modern notes and the spirit of olden time in some quarters. Center of the city abounds with skyscrapers, but however, there are plenty of large parks in the city and it is regarded as “green”. Piedmont Park is worthy of the attention of those who study the sights.
Population of Atlanta is more than 500 thousand people. And more than half of them are African Americans. Nevertheless, the situation here is quite peaceful, residents welcome tourists, always willing to help.
This city has many interesting places. One of them is the World of Coca-Cola museum. Here lovers of this popular drink can get to know everything about it, except for the recipe, of course. There is a very popular entertainment as an excursion to the main office of CNN, during which it is possible to see a live broadcast of the largest American television company. Amazing place is museum of Martin Luther King. You can enjoy nature in the Botanical Garden, which area is over 12 hectares. In the city there are a lot of museums, there is an aquarium.
Tourists who visited Atlanta will not leave the city without pleasant impressions.
","map":"place/united-states,atlanta"}
name: united-states-georgia-atlanta

content:
{"annotation":"Each year hundreds of thousands of gamblers gather together in Las Vegas. And his “fellow” is Atlantic City. Here casino on land can be built legally as well. City wins Las Vegas due to the warm, pleasant climate, proximity to New York City and the location on the Atlantic coast.
But in this city you can visit not only gambling establishments. Sights in Atlantic City are quite attractive for tourists. In addition, both sandy beaches and extraordinary panorama of ocean space are very attractive. Locals extend a warm welcome to the tourists; they became accustomed to the influx of foreigners in their city long time ago.
Every tourist dreams to visit Taj Mahal Casino. This is creation of Donald Trump. Awesome establishment combines not only casino, but also the stage on which the world-famous celebrities appear, as well as restaurants and sports arena. Unique Atlantic City Boardwalk is a place where you can walk forever. Here there are the amusements, art gallery, and historical museum. Children and adults become enthusiastic over the visiting the aquarium center and dolphinarium. Local hotels can be safely classed among the attractions. They are architectural marvels, each of which has a unique design.
Visiting Atlantic City is not only an opportunity to try your luck at the gaming table, have a swim in the gentle ocean waves, but also just have a good rest.
","map":"place/united-states,atlantic-city"}
name: united-states-new-jersey-atlantic-city

content:
{"annotation":"If you are lucky enough to visit the state of Texas, the first thing is to visit its capital. Austin is a million-plus city, where there are many notable places. Here local residents are respectful towards the tourists and visitors; they are modern people with their problems and concerns. However, they always find time to relax. In Austin there are a lot of young people.
Attractions of Austin include architecture, museums, and parks. Near Lady Bird Lake a prestigious district is located, in which there are hotels and the most beautiful parks with biking tracks and walking roads. This recreation area is recognized as one of the best in the city. Texas State Capitol worthily represents attractions of the city.
 Austin is rich in lakes. They attract a huge number of locals and tourists who want to have a lounge outside. Popular places are Lake Travis, Zilker Metropolitan Park, and others.
It is worth to visit the local stadium Darrell K Royal. This city is also considered the capital of live music. It can be heard everywhere: in the streets, in bars, clubs, and restaurants. Life is pulsing day and night here.
In Austin you can see more interesting things, you need only to decide to come here for a portion of new impressions.
","map":"place/united-states,austin"}
name: united-states-texas-austin

content:
{"annotation":" Called at one time the second gate for immigrants, today Baltimore port is the most visited city of Maryland state, major political and cultural center of the United States. The abundance of sights makes it attractive to American tourists and foreign guests. Baltimore is known for many monuments and museums, stadiums and galleries.
Hallmark of the city and its main attraction is rightfully considered the National Aquarium, where visitors curiously observe the life of 11,000 sea creatures: fish, amphibians, and mammals; admire the popular dolphin show, watch piranhas and sharks.
Lovers of history and culture of the country visit willingly the famous places of the city – the Inner Harbor. Picturesque streets of Baltimore harbor will guide you along the ships-museums, sailing ships and submarine to the skyscrapers of downtown: World Trade Center, the building of the American Bank and octagonal spire of Charles Center Office Tower.
Stunning architecture of city center with marble churches and typical for Baltimore brick houses in colonial style contrasts with the miserable hovels of the city suburbs. One of the oldest Christian churches in the United States, Baltimore Basilica of the early 19th century, is a place of pilgrimage for Catholics from all over the world. It admires by the beauty of the outer and inner architecture. In the maze of skyscrapers there are the main attractions of the city: the largest in the United States Railroad Museum, Baseball Museum, Washington Monument and the obelisk of Edgar Allan Poe grave.
After a busy day guests of Baltimore can relax in the Power Plant Live entertainment complex located in the building of an unusual shape. Citizens, most of whom are African Americans, are distinguished by hospitality and cordiality.
","map":"place/united-states,baltimore"}
name: united-states-maryland-baltimore

content:
{"annotation":" Travel across America is a great variant for an active holiday. It is not necessary to visit the major cities. Bloomington, which is located in the State of Indiana, is small, but greets the travelers hospitably.
The first thing you should admire – emerald Indiana University campus. It is built of limestone, great amount of which is around the city. The campus is among the most beautiful in the country. Studying here is a dream of every student.
Campus includes several interesting buildings. Auditorium building, originally from the 40s of the 20th century, holds in its bosom panels of mural by Thomas Hart Benton, which was shrouded in scandals and rumors at one time.
Courthouse honorably represents the sights of Bloomington. It is also worthwhile to see it. You can also walk around the Courthouse Square.
Lovers of spiritual techniques will enjoy visiting the Tibetan Cultural Center – the only one in the whole country. This is the place where you can find lovers of meditation. And paintings of Monet, Warhol, Matisse, Rodin, and even Picasso are stored in Indiana University Art Museum.
Bloomington is a great place for the followers of quiet lifestyle, architecture and painting.
","map":"place/united-states,bloomington"}
name: united-states-minnesota-bloomington

content:
{"annotation":" There is a city in the United States which everyone interested in the history of States simply need to visit. Boston – the main artery of the State of Massachusetts, it is famous for being the richest and oldest city in the country. 
 Boston is located in the region that bears the name of New England. And it, like Britain itself, has something new to offer tourists. Sights of Boston include cobwebs of parks, architectural structures and museums. First of all, you should feel the greatness of the oldest park of the country. And Boston Public Library amazes not only by the number of books, which it keeps on its walls, but also by the incredible architecture. It is interesting to see Boston National Park – on its territory there are as much as 34 islands with plenty of sights.
Lovers of art and cultural property shouldn’t ignore the numerous museums including the Boston Museum of Science, Museum of Fine Arts, and others. And amateurs of promenade prefer to stroll along the Freedom Trail, which is the length of 4 kilometers. 
 The city has many churches belonging to different religious communities.
A tour to Boston would be just informative, useful and enjoyable.
","map":"place/united-states,boston"}
name: united-states-massachusetts-boston

content:
{"annotation":" Small towns of America are interesting by their way of life. Branson town is their bright exemplar. Population here does not hold up to 7000 people. Despite the fact that everyone in town knows each other, residents are friendly and supportive to visitors and tourists. If you want to see America from the inside, you should definitely visit Branson.
Though attractions of this town are not numerous, but they cause keen interest of tourists. You can have a great fun and rest at the amusement park called Silver Dollar City. And married couples with children especially like to visit the Toy Museum. Such leisure brings a lot of positive impressions regardless of age.
Branson can offer much more fun. Visitors can go to the fish hatchery Shepherd of the Hills. Showboat and Butterfly Palace cause a lot of emotions. And the main attraction of Branson is the water park. Here numerous water slides are combined with the contemplative nature.
Branson is a small stroke to a huge portrait of the United States of America. But you can visit it to get new impression.
","map":"place/united-states,branson"}
name: united-states-missouri-branson

content:
{"annotation":" Pacific Coast is rich in interesting places which perfectly suitable for vacation. Carlsbad town presents seven kilometers of coastline, mass of attractions, pleasant Californian climate and interesting history of origin.
Fans of the construction toy “Lego” enjoy visiting park called Legoland California Resort. It will be useful for music lovers to go to the Music Museum and see the collection of musical instruments, modern and ancient. Some of them belonged to the worldwide famous stars.
Carlsbad is famous for its healing waters. It is even compared with the resort of Karlovy Vary. Healing waters from local sources are recommended in the gastrointestinal diseases, colitis, gastritis, kidney disease, obesity.
The urban beach outspreaded for miles deserves special mention. There is a place for everyone. Clean golden sand, calm, gentle ocean waves – all of this attracts thousands of married couples with children. In Carlsbad it is warm almost all year round, so the city is always in thrill of anticipation guests. Why don’t you dip into its calm atmosphere of the resort?
","map":"place/united-states,carlsbad"}
name: united-states-california-carlsbad

content:
{"annotation":" Excellent reputation of Charleston as a resort, calm city with a rich history attracts thousands of tourists. It is adornment of the east coast of the United States. The city was founded in 1670 and it is seen in local sights, most of which is located in North Charleston.
Local port belongs to the cohort of the largest in the country. An interesting feature of the city – it is “low”. There are very few multi-storey buildings on the streets. But tourists can enjoy a stroll through the historic quarter, admire the mansions and buildings of different architectural styles including classical, neo-greek, victorian, colonial.
Fort Sumter honorably represents the sights of Charleston. And French Quarter abounds with art galleries, churches and notable buildings. It is interesting to visit the Naval Museum, the Aquarium of South Carolina. Bridge over the Cooper River affords an amazing view of the city.
Visiting Charleston will give you new impression, let you know many new facts of American history and history of particular region of the country. Whether to go there? Definitely, yes!
","map":"place/united-states,charleston"}
name: united-states-south-carolina-charleston

content:
{"annotation":" North Carolina cordially welcomes visitors, especially the city of Charlotte. Nearly 2 million people live here together with the suburbs.
Architecture of Charlotte is a bright reflection of modernity of the 21st century. Skyscraper, which height is 265 meters, immediately attracts attention. This building houses the headquarters of the largest bank in the country. The city is one of the financial centers of America that doesn’t prevent him to amaze visitors by attractions and entertainment for all tastes.
Charlotte is a godsend for lovers of nightlife. At the center there are more than 120 restaurants, fifty sports bars, plenty of pubs and clubs.
Art lovers will enjoy Museum of Modern Art, Museum of Arts and Design, which takes a few complexes. Huge automobile track constantly holds various activities. A Bank of America Stadium is the place where the matches of American football are held. Carowinds attracts fans of extreme sports and fun. This is a giant entertainment center. The city annually hosts numerous festivals.
Charlotte is a place where everyone should spend a vacation at least once in life. This is a real modern American city with a rich history.
","map":"place/united-states,charlotte"}
name: united-states-north-carolina-charlotte

content:
{"annotation":" Humble, but very hospitable, Chattanooga adorns the border of states Georgia and Tennessee. USA holds a lot of surprises. And first of all, the strangeness lies in the fact that such small towns have a special charm. Attractions of Chattanooga, though few in number, but always arouse interest of visitors of the town.
The town stands on the Tennessee River, and is known by well-maintained green river bank, which as though designed for quiet, family strolls. Symbolic river, as though broken through the thickness of the asphalt, arouses interest. Tourists like to be photographed next to this attraction.
Aquarium of Chattanooga is well-known. There are sea and river expositions. And in the square in front of this establishment art festivals are often held, gathering fans of contemporary music and art. Trail of Tears, which is waves of water fell on the steps, is noteworthy as well.
The main local attraction is Ruby Falls. It throws down the flow of water from the 45-meter height inside the karst cave located in Lookout Mountain. Tourists can go down into the cave by elevator.
Chattanooga is full of surprises, the town amazes visitors, despite its modest size.
","map":"place/united-states,chattanooga"}
name: united-states-tennessee-chattanooga

content:
{"annotation":" Chicago is on the third place among populous USA cities, it is inferior to New York and Los Angeles. Each district of the city is notable for its individual character and appearance. For example, the Loop district is characterized as the business district of the city. Most of the city's skyscrapers are located there.
The most famous skyscraper and attraction in Chicago is the Willis Tower. Skyscraper rises to 443.2 meters and has 110 floors.
Willis Tower is a popular destination for tourists and travelers from all over the world. On the 103 floor there is an observation deck Skydeck Chicago, which is made as an enclosed balcony in the form of cabin, which can contain up to 5 people and sustain up to 5 tons of weight. From here in good weather you can see the panorama of the city and also the territory of 4 states or just look down and tickle your nerves.
The observation deck is very popular among tourists and is open all year round. Each year the tourist traffic on the skyscraper is about 1.3 of tourists, so to come here, you have to stand in a queue for some time, but you cannot come to Chicago and not visit one of the most high-rise buildings in the world Willis Tower and Skydeck observation deck at Chicago.
","map":"place/united-states,chicago"}
name: united-states-illinois-chicago

content:
{"annotation":" The very name of the city says that Clearwater is a place with white sand beaches and crystal clear water. Clearwater Beach is the best beach in Florida on a canvass of residents and tourists who visited it. This is a city where people come to enjoy the sun, water sports and just have fun.
On the territory of the city of Clearwater there are many beautiful parks, most of which have paved land and water routes, nature reserves with rare species of birds, as well as picnic areas where you can just sit and enjoy nature.
On one of the city's attractions – Clearwater Beach you can enjoy the sunset in the evenings – it is really exciting performance, when the city freezes, to see the sun goes down. Everyone can find an entertainment in Clearwater Beach, for example, you can go on a traveling boat, fishing boat, and pirate ship and see the beauty of the local nature, can go scuba diving, parasailing, swim with dolphins, or snorkelling.
It is also possible to arrange a specific entertainment and go on a pirate adventure. It's fun for the whole family. Children receive pirate hats, water pistols, can participate in the contest "treasure hunt" and dancing with animators, and this time Mom and Dad have fun and enjoy cocktails.
","map":"place/united-states,clearwater"}
name: united-states-florida-clearwater

content:
{"annotation":" Lovers of culture, sports and entertainment will find it all in the USA city of Columbus. Nightlife of Columbus is rich and varied – it includes all sorts of entertainment, ranging from student bars to institutions of higher class.
Columbus has a world-class attraction. This is Ohio Theater built in 1928 and completely renovated. Ohio Theatre was awarded the title of National Historic Landmark in 1977. It has about 3000 thousand seats and a chandelier, stunning in its size – 21 meters. And the Spanish Baroque style, in which its interior is made, will do any evening, spent in the theater, unforgettable.
Playbills are full of events of diverse genres and performances, from classical music to contemporary dance. The best performing artists in the world appear on the stage here every year.
Thanks to its lush interiors and excellent acoustics theater Ohio has become the idol of the public and the artists. There were such famous artists as Liza Minnelli, John Denver, Anne-Sophie Mutter, Carole King, Julie Andrews, as well as the world-famous Columbus Symphony Orchestra, BalletMet, and Broadway Across America.
","map":"place/united-states,columbus"}
name: united-states-ohio-columbus

content:
{"annotation":" Settlement on the site of today's Dallas was founded in 1841, and Dallas was officially registered as a city in February 1856. It is ranked 9th of the most populous cities in America. The city is situated on the river Trinity, which poses a threat of flooding.
In the metropolis you can find considerable number of attractions and historical monuments, such as several museums with extensive collections of works of art, and that's exclusive of many wonderful museums with small private collections, such as The Sixth Floor Museum – a former Texas School Book Storage, now a museum. It is small, but it has collected a vast number of information about the murder of John F. Kennedy.
The museum was founded on 22 February 1989 as a tribute to the extraordinary man, John Fitzgerald Kennedy, the youngest president of the United States. Since then, it has become an integral part of the city, the urban landscape and cultural heritage. The museum is located exactly in the building, from which John F. Kennedy was shot in 1963. Although the museum is called “Sixth Floor Museum”, it is located on the seventh one, but Lee Harvey Oswald shot at President a few times exactly from the sixth floor.
","map":"place/united-states,dallas"}
name: united-states-texas-dallas

content:
{"annotation":" Officially, Denver is the largest city and capital of the State of Colorado. It is the second most populous city after El Paso County in Colorado. Denver is a very young city by historical standards. Prospectors from Kansas helped to found it from a camp of the miners in the middle of 19th century.
If the traveler is looking for the atmosphere of the old Wild West and wants to plunge into cowboy culture, Denver is a place where he will find what he is looking for. One of the attractions of Denver – Colorado State Capitol, in which Colorado General Assembly sits. It was built in 1890 using white granite in the neoclassical style, and was opened to the public in 1894. The construction rises to 180 feet (55 m), it is approximate height of the 18-storied building.
The interior of the Capitol is made of great amount of pink onyx, rare pink marble obtained from the mine near Beulah, Colorado, and white marble was used for the creation of the floor in the Capitol. The dome is covered with plates of gold.
Most windows have patterns, which are paintings of historical events related to Colorado. Each room of the Capitol is decorated with images of USA presidents.
","map":"place/united-states,denver"}
name: united-states-colorado-denver

content:
{"annotation":"Flagstaff is a city located in the USA, the State of Arizona. This city is one of the most mountainous parts of the USA and is situated at a height of 7,000 feet or about 2,100 metres according to the metric system of measurements.
 Near the city there is Lowell Observatory, the oldest one in the USA. The astronomers working in this observatory discovered the planet Pluto in 1930 and the rings of Uranus in 1977.
 The centre of the city has plenty of historical sights. Flagstaff was founded in the 1890 s, and one can see a lot of red brick houses built during that epoch in the historical centre of the city.The Museum of Northern Arizona located in Flagstaff is famous for its exhibits that include archaeological evidence found near the city.Moreover, this museum helps people to get in touch with the history of such Indian tribes as the Hopi, Pai, Navajo. The museum has a shop of Indian products and handicrafts.But excursions to the Grand Canyon, one of the symbols of the USA, are really the main tourist attraction of Flagstaff. You are offered a one-day trip that will give you an opportunity to see magnificent mountainous landscapes (so do not forget to take your camera with you) and will produce unforgettable impressions.
","map":"place/united-states,flagstaff"}
name: united-states-arizona-flagstaff

content:
{"annotation":" Fort Lauderdale, a resort city in the U.S. state of Florida, is often called the “Venice of America”. This name was given to the city because it has a wide canal system that is used for the great annual exhibition of expensive yachts. The exhibition attracts crowds of tourists, which brings profit to the city.
 Tourists have a lot must-sees in Fort Lauderdale, among which there is the monument of the 20th century architecture Stranahan House built in 1901 by Frank Stranahan who is considered to be Fort Lauderdale’s founder. This is the oldest surviving structure in Broward County. The building has served as a trading post, post office, town hall, and home to the Stranahans. It is wooden-frame and has broad verandahs where you can admire a spectacular view of the New River. This monument of architecture is situated in the heart of Fort Lauderdale. It has played a significant role in the economic and social life of the city. A guided tour of the Stranahan House Museum, a monument of architecture with a rich history, is a journey through time.
 Besides, you can just have a rest or opt for activities in the city. For example, you can enjoy fishing, boating or sailing along the city canals.
","map":"place/united-states,fort-lauderdale"}
name: united-states-florida-fort-lauderdale

content:
{"annotation":" Fort Myers Beach is a popular destination in the USA among tourists, who want to go kayaking, parasailing and doing other water sports. Also travelers who are interested in eco-tourism will find lots of fun here, for example, they will be able to swim with dolphins.
Municipality of Fort Myers Beach is located in the state of Florida, on a small island of about seven miles length, and has a fabulous beautiful beach, which is a natural attraction.
On the beach crowds of tourists gather on the costume show “Pirate Festival”, which takes place annually in early October. The program includes a variety of contests, quests, rum tasting and prize drawing. All those who will visit the festival, will be able to purchase real pirate treasure at the market: leather handbags, handmade jewelry, beautiful gold and silver ware, pottery, inlaid with precious stones, and gypsy clothes. Festival attracts a very interesting audience, among which you can meet the artists, writers and poets.
Fort Myers Beach is the perfect place for a beach holiday for the whole family.
","map":"place/united-states,fort-myers-beach"}
name: united-states-florida-fort-myers-beach

content:
{"annotation":" Gatlinburg is a resort town in Tennessee in the United States, which infrastructure is oriented on tourists and travelers. History of the town takes its roots in the 19th century, and it received its name from Radford Gatlin, who opened the first shop in the village.
Strolling through the city and its surroundings, you can find plenty of attractions, including Guinness World Records Museum, there are about 1,200 incredible exhibit items, as well as the Hollywood Star Cars Museum (Museum of cars of Hollywood stars).
In order to enjoy all attractions of Gatlinburg at a time, you can climb on Crockett Mountain, and see the panorama of the city with the naked eye or with binoculars. In the day height of mountains offers breathtaking views of the lush forests and the natural beauty of the National Park Great Smoky Mountains, which is under the protection of UNESCO World Heritage Organization. In the evening, it lighted with dazzling lights of Gatlinburg, which makes the panorama even more picturesque and romantic.
","map":"place/united-states,gatlinburg"}
name: united-states-tennessee-gatlinburg

content:
{"annotation":" Honolulu is the capital and one of the most visited cities in the American state Hawaii. Name of the city of Honolulu can be translated from the Hawaiian language as “Sheltered bay”.
One of the attractions of Honolulu is arboretum botanical garden called the Lyon Arboretum. Lyon Arboretum is an oasis in the recess of the island of Oahu, which presents visitors their extensive collections of tropical plants on the area of 800 km2. Entrance is free for the visitors.
Originally Lyon Arboretum was created as a nursery for the project of reforestation on the island of Oahu, but now it is a part of the University of Hawaii. Arboretum is a specific place for scientists and people who wish to study the life of plants in the tropics. It is recognized as one of the leaders among the objects in the field of biology, nature conservation, ethnobotany, and horticulture.
Lyon Arboretum contains about 7500 species of flora of the Pacific and Asia, including 200 of them – it is the flora of the Hawaiian Islands. Laboratories of arboretum specialize in growing, breeding and conservation of endangered Hawaiian plant species.
Honolulu is a famous tourist center, which is visited by several million tourists annually. Here it is safe and beautiful, and if tourists do not have problems with finances, then stay on the island will be relaxed and carefree.
","map":"place/united-states,honolulu"}
name: united-states-hawaii-honolulu

content:
{"annotation":" In the southern and eastern areas of Houston a lot of unique and interesting sights are focused. One of the most important of them – Central Zoo –attracts many tourists with children every day. Houston Zoo is one of a kind place that offers you and your children familiarity with wildlife. Currently the zoo contains over 4,500 species of exotic animals from all corners of the globe.
If you've been dreaming to see rodeo, you can put your dream into reality in Houston. All you need to do is to visit the Reliant stadium. Even if you are indifferent to this entertainment, anyway performances of the entertainers of international level will fascinate you, and you can taste the best barbecue.
Walking around the city will be unforgettable and impressive, if you choose to visit one of the major holiday destinations – Memorial Park. Its area is 1400 hectares. Here are walking and pedestrian areas, paths for athletes and a great golf course.
In the south of Houston there are a lot of museums related to history, science, art. Among the most interesting local attractions are Children's Museum of Houston, Museum of Natural Science, Sam Houston Park and Water theme park.
Discovering the sights of Houston is always an amazing experience!
","map":"place/united-states,houston"}
name: united-states-texas-houston

content:
{"annotation":" The sights in the city of Indianapolis that attract crowds of tourists from different countries reflect back much light upon the history of the country and exalt it, glorify its heroes and are considered to be unique masterpieces of architecture designed by talented architects.
In Indianapolis there are six districts that are officially acknowledged as cultural and the main centres of guided tours for tourists. The construction of the Cultural Trail has recently been finished. The Cultural Trail connects five most popular tourist attractions in Indianapolis because all of them are located in the city centre.
Tourists get really fascinated by the majestic 87-metre Soldiers’ and Sailors’ Monument located in the centre of a picteresque large round square. The imposing monument was erected in 1902 to commemorate soldiers and sailors who fell in battle during the Civil War. This imposing monument is topped with a statue of the Goddess of Freedom that seems to be frozen in full motion, the bottom of the monument is decorated with limestone bas-reliefs with well wrought details that depict battle scenes. The monument can be seen from any spot in the city and is surrounded by green trees and beautiful bright flowerbeds. You can take a rest on the square near the monument and drink a cup of flavoured strong coffee while listening to the gentle murmur of a waterfall fountain. A lot of visitors have a rest sitting on the stone steps of the monument. Under the monument there is the Civil War Museum where visitors can see a very interesting exposition.
Another cultural monument Indianapolis is famous for is the capitol of the state. This Renaissance building with green shabbily looking domes on which there are the banners flapping in the warm wind is the seat of the General Assembly of the state. The building is surrounded by many trees and a delightful evergreen lawn. Not only tourists, but also local people go here to admire the capitol and take a rest.
One of the main tourist attractions is the Scottish Rite Cathedral in whose amazing building exhibitions are held and concerts are given. Tourists are also interested in the mansion of Benjamin Harrison that stands out from other family houses because of its architecture. This building with a magnificent ballroom and ten elegantly styled spacious rooms was given to the popular museum whose most important exhibits are books.
Among the interesting and remarkable buildings in Indianapolis there is its tallest building called Chase Tower that is 214 metres high and the skyscraper One Indiana Square. The pedestrian quay near the canal with the cleanest water gives visitors an opportunity to admire the best views of the central part of Indianapolis.
","map":"place/united-states,indianapolis"}
name: united-states-indiana-indianapolis

content:
{"annotation":" Many tourists dream to travel around the world visiting the most memorable cities with a unique history, magnificent architecture and world-famous attractions. You can begin your journey round the world in the city of Irvine, which is conveniently nestled in sunny California and welcomes all overseas travelers.
Back in 2008 Irvin was elected as the fourth best city in the United States for living, because income of citizens is high enough and the crime level is the lowest according to FBI statistics. So that vacation is safe and comfortable as well. It is definitely worth to visit this quiet town, because here are the best universities of California, which are included in the rating of the best five American universities. As you know, the University of California is a prestigious place to get higher education, so that not only tourists, but also students dream to visit Irvine.
Among the main attractions of Irwin it is worth to notice famous Santa Ana Zoo and open-air concert amphitheater Verizon Wireless, which is located in 13 km near the city. Impressions will be bright, and the journey to the United States will stick in memory for a long time.
","map":"place/united-states,irving"}
name: united-states-texas-irving

content:
{"annotation":" Do you want to get acquainted with the real America, with the wonderful city, where the climate is warm, but not hot; where spacious calm beaches are not crowded by holidayers; where the city center isn’t look like teeming anthill of people and vehicles; where the pace of life is measured and comfort; where people know how to appreciate, create and preserve the art? And at the same time Jacksonville is a modern city with a million-plus population co-opted all advantages of the American metropolis and deprived of its shortcomings.
Riverwalks waterfronts, favorite places for walking among tourists, extend on both river-banks of the St. John River. Strolling along the northern waterfront, you will easy find MOCA Jacksonville – Museum of Contemporary Art, the cultural center of the city. On the south river-bank you can visit the Museum of History and Science (MOSH) – the most popular Jacksonville Museum. At the same place, to the south of the river, you should feast eyes on “The Fountain of Friendship” in St. John's River Park. In 1965 this magnificent fountain was considered the largest in the world.
For shoppers Jacksonville Landing is raised on the bank of St. John's River – a huge two-level complex of glass and metal. The complex offers shops, restaurants and all kinds of entertainment. Architectural wonder, the famous drawbridge Jacksonville's Main Street Bridge crosses the river in the center of downtown. It is very popular among lovers of running and walking. To the north of downtown there is Jacksonville Zoo and Gardens – a huge zoo and botanical garden, where you can see more than thousand plants and two thousand animals.
Sandy beaches are not crowded, they are ideal for walking and relax. There you can enjoy fishing and water sports, boating. To the south-west of the city Adventure Landing spreads out – a large amusement park for children and adults. On the Atlantic coast, in Jacksonville Beach, there is a water park with a great number of funny water amusements. If you like sports, remember – Ever Bank Field Stadium is located in the city center. It is the main base of the team “Jacksonville Jaguars”, which defends the city in the National Football League.
As you can see, all things necessary for a full family vacation are concentrated in Jacksonville. Welcome to Jacksonville!
","map":"place/united-states,jacksonville-beach"}
name: united-states-florida-jacksonville-beach

content:
{"annotation":" Incredibly beautiful landscapes entail on Kauai – one of the oldest Hawaiian island – not only curious tourists and honeymooners, but also successful Hollywood directors. Small enough to fully feel all the charm of island life, Kauai says "aloha" to active travelers and lovers of quiet beach vacation, naturalists and romantics who want to enjoy the delights of the famous "island-garden".
180-kilometer coastline with beautiful sandy beaches – lived-in and intact – a great alternative to vain metropolis. Lumahai Beach and Tunnels Beach are the most popular destinations for lovers of beach vacations and diving. Avid golfers and beginners will appreciate the stunning views of the island surrounding during training in one of the local golf clubs.
One of the most unusual sights of the island of Kauai is a natural geyser Spouting Horn on the southern coast, throwing out 18-meter water column at high tide. Amazing sight awaits visitors of Waimea Canyon in the western part of Kauai. 16-kilometer gorge with beautiful landscapes touches feelings of energetic tourists.
Naturalists from all over the world come to admire the beauty of nature in the shady gardens of the island. Lavai Garden was awarded the diploma of the USA Congress, Allerton and Limahuli Botanic Gardens are known by unique collections of tropical plants and historical monuments. Rare species of island animals are kept in the Alakai nature reserve.
Any kind of trip to Kauai you choose – along the coast in  canoe, riding in the canyon, hiking in the rocky cliffs or helicopter tour, you will always be accompanied by fascinating landscapes and a surprising lack of sense of time, typical for the island.
","map":"place/united-states,kauai-county"}
name: united-states-hawaii-kauai-county

content:
{"annotation":" Key West is the southernmost city of the USA situated in Florida. Due to its geographical values, it is popular as a place of resort, therewith it is the main city in the state. As far as it is a beach resort, where the temperature has never dropped below freezing, it attracts the great number of tourists, arriving by sea and by land in order to enjoy local fine views.
The sights of Key West are rather various. At first this city had been a refuge for pirates, and later it was changed due to architecture in the Victorian style. There are a lot of art exhibitions in the city, where the pictures both of the masters and beginning artists are exposed. You should visit a monument in the form of buoy, it is made of cement and has a distinctive inscription.
Here there is whole lot of various museums, which can satisfy the most inquiring visitors. Among them is the wreckage museum, national historical park, Hemingway’s house. You can go for a sail in a boat with transparent bottom, watching breathtaking beautiful sea animals. You can also take a walk along the main city street, Duval.
In this resort town there are a lot of cats peacefully promenade in the streets, entering the shops and begging food in the parks. Besides Key West is deemed to be a center of democratic attitude towards sexual minorities, because here the unisexual marriages are allowed.
","map":"place/united-states,key-west"}
name: united-states-florida-key-west

content:
{"annotation":" Kissimmee is a paradise for being on vacation with a family. Kissimmee town is a warm and cozy place for comfortable family vacation in America.
 This small town is situated in Florida within the territory of the USA. It is noted for its hospitality and warm climate. The people in the town always welcome new guests arriving from other parts of the planet and are very proud of constructions in the town, because they were reconstructed after a large number of hurricanes striking this territory. 
 The environmental compatibility is regarded as the main tourist attraction of the town, because it is the most ecologically harmless town in the USA. Not only the people living in Florida come here to amuse leisure but also a lot of tourists from other countries arrive here to visit the park Walt Disney World Park, which was opened in 1971 not far away from the town. They go to town in order to take a dive into the fairy-tale, created by the unique animated characters headed by fabulous MIKKI MAUS. 
 Fantastic leisure time can be varied by shopping in a lot of gift shops, where there is all necessary for travelers. 
 The unforgettable walk in the Entertainment Park, fine cuisine in local restaurants and quiet comfortable air – all these things suggest that this town is the best place for vacation with a family and children.
","map":"place/united-states,kissimmee"}
name: united-states-florida-kissimmee

content:
{"annotation":" The Capital of the Hawaiian kingdom is Lahaina town. Once a long ago a palace complex was erected in it. The first school was opened there by a missionary and teacher who came from the Continent of North America. This institution was attracting new habitants more and more.
The travelers and tourists hurry from all corners of the world to visit this ecologically-friendly place. We advise you to visit it and enjoy seeing the splendid sights. The public park-garden Watertown is one of them. Here the fig “the banyan tree” has been growing from ancient times. This giant plant occupies several hectares now. The locals consider this tree to be sacred and bringing luck to a man.
At the beginning of every year the championships and tournaments are conducted there. They are carried out on plantation in Kapalua. Since the middle of the 20-th century the players from all over the world have run golf competitions on the local fields.It is a must to visit another unique place, which is one of most ancient in the world. The pyramid of pharaoh Zhores is already more than 5, 5 thousand years old. Its height is equal to 140 meters, it weighs more than 3 tons. This very beautiful, unique manmade construction leaves a great positive impression. 
","map":"place/united-states,lahaina"}
name: united-states-hawaii-lahaina

content:
{"annotation":" Las Vegas is a land of Lady Luck Las Vegas is situated in the center the Mojave Desert in Nevada. The city is not densely populated, there are only near half a million inhabitants here, but they are enough to jazz up the largest entertainment city in the world. The great number of casino and gaming-houses, splendid hotels, astonishing music halls and, of course, hundreds of restaurants, where the best cooks of the world offer their clients the various specialties.
Besides, there are a lot of sights in the city, which should be visited. Foremost, one of the most beautiful wildlife reservations of the USA is Canyon Red Rock, annually visited by more than one million tourists. The Hoover Dam also is worth to be visited. It is classified among seven industrial wonders of our world.
The visit to the Sun Circus is a must. Here the acrobats “tell” the enchanting fairy-tales using the language of their body. You should see the show of the group “Blue man”, presented in a hall of the hotel «Venice». These three men have admirers all over the world for a reason: their musical-vaudevillian shows are just unforgettable!And above all rest just wander around this extraordinary city, because the buildings of modern hotels and casinos such as Rio, New-York, Luxor are worth to be seen. Remarkable, unforgotten, unique in everything Las Vegas will touch the travelers’ feelings without doubt.
","map":"place/united-states,las-vegas"}
name: united-states-nevada-las-vegas

content:
{"annotation":" Los Angeles is a city of allurementsLos Angeles comes the second in the USA speaking about the population size. About 17 million persons live in it. There are little more than 80 districts in the city, and every district shines out in its own way. 
 The famous Hollywood and West Side are the most popular places.Here you find the wonderful Californian beaches with gold sand and powder-blue waves, wonderful parks, museums and, certainly, agricultural market. Exactly with this place we advise to begin sightseeing. Its colour and variety will allow the tourists to learn more about the local life.The Runyon Canyon, which is within walking distance of the Walk of Fame, strikes with its astonishing city view. The second-largest parkland in the USA is Griffith Park, a picturesque place, in which you can enjoy harmony of natural and manmade beauties.
There are the world-wide renowned film studios in LA. We advise to begin with “Paramount Pictures”. This studio is already more than 100 years. You should remember the famous Rodeo-drive, the street, on which the world famous “Pretty Woman” turned into a queen after being a Cinderella. Also there are several excellent museums in Los Angeles: Getty Art Gallery, National Museum of Arts and Observatory. This city has all reasons to be a pie in the sky, in fact it is fabulous! 
","map":"place/united-states,los-angeles"}
name: united-states-california-los-angeles

content:
{"annotation":"  Memphis is the biggest city in the Tennessee state and is situated on the Mississippi banks. It was founded in the first quarter of 19th century by the 7th President of the USA, Andrew Jackson. It was called after a city in Egypt. 
 Memphis is rightfully called the motherland of Blues music and it’s still one of the biggest music recording centers in the world. Here is the famous mansion Grace Land – home of great Rock-n-Roll King, Elvis Presley. A lot of tourists start their get-to-know trip around the city right here. Paying a visit to this house, the second popular house in the USA, you should head for Beale Stet. The traffic is restricted here at nights and it turns into a stage for musicians of various styles and genres. Call on a club which are plentiful there or enjoy live music in an open-air café. 
 A river trip is really worth your time which can take from a couple of hours to a whole day. Stunning nature, lovely cityscapes and mild climate make the trip remarkable and bright. You should definitely take a look at Pyramid Arena shopping mall. The city hasn’t forgotten the origin of its name and installed a large steel-and-glass construction reminding of the great Egyptian pyramids. To feel the spirit of the city in its true might you must visit a game of Memphis Grizzlies and delight in the professionalism of the sportsmen. Its renowned 18.000 seat basketball arena FedEx Forum is one of the most popular in the northern part of the USA.
 Take a tram trip through downtown, have a look at Edge district with lots of wonderful cafes and cozy restaurants. National Civil Rights Museum is another site to visit, as well as Pink Palace Museum with a bounty of most interesting items on display.
 Every traveler should know: Memphis is a night city. So you should be ready to spend sleepless nights in the buzzing night life of the city.
","map":"place/united-states,memphis"}
name: united-states-tennessee-memphis

content:
{"annotation":" Miami: sights The city, which is situated in the south-east part of Florida on the coast of the Atlantic Ocean, attracts thousands of tourists from all over the world and it is named Miami. In the USA it comes the eighth speaking about the population size.
Once a long ago, approximately in the 18-th century, only 310 persons lived here. Today this city is deemed to be a large tourist center. The travelers arrive at this ecologically friendly place almost from all over the world in order to go sightseeing and visit the most popular beaches, for example, Haulover.
The most interesting place is the National Park, which is known here as Edelweiss. It consists of jungles, bogs and prairies. There you can find the rare spices of animals and birds. This enormous part of virgin wild nature attracts thousands of people.
Do not forget to look in the eldest City Aquarium, situated in the center. The sharks, sea-lions, orcs and many other animals take part in shows here. When you are in this wonderful and one-of-a-kind place, you should visit zoos, museums, water parks, aquariums and many other sights together with tour guides. Have a look at the Holocaust memorial. Take a cruise to the island of Jungles. And the visit to the Fashion Mecca, Lincoln Road, is a must-do. 
","map":"place/united-states,florida,miami"}
name: united-states-florida-miami

content:
{"annotation":" We believe that one person in three on earth dreams to visit or have a rest in Miami Beach. Astonishing, fashionable, attractive and inviting beaches draw hundreds of thousands of tourists, travelers and party goers from all over the world.
Miami Beach is a marvelous seaside resort, located in the USA. If you are lucky enough to be there, then first of all walk into shopping center Bayside Marketplace, because this place is deemed to be the most popular among the tourists. It is situated straight on water in a very picturesque place: on the shore of the bay of the same name.In this shopping center you will find restaurants, bars, enormous amount of boutiques, and also many other entertainments, including attractions. The greatest advantage of this place is an easy parking because the area around is spacious. Besides it is very joyful in Bayside Marketplace, there is always a live music in it and also it is rather crowded in days off there.
Those, who are fond of exclusive places, will appreciate Bayside Marketplace without doubt. Both locals and tourists enjoy visiting it. A lot of comments are written about this shopping mall. But still the main thing about it is not meal, not shopping, but a gentle warm breeze, gold sand and warm, tender sun.
","map":"place/united-states,miami-beach"}
name: united-states-florida-miami-beach

content:
{"annotation":" Moab is a fairy-tale, created by nature Moab is a small town, hidden in canyons in the eastern part of Utah. Having the population slightly more than 5 thousands persons, it is famous all over the whole world for its beautiful nature.
It has no sense to tell you about magnificence of Grand Canyon or Valley of Death, because they are described in hundreds of films, books, pieces of painting and pictures. Do you remember a famous Windows Startup Screen with rocks? It is the territory of Canyonlands National Park. You should go there early in the morning or at sunset. Even the most experienced traveler will be struck by a fantastic view. There are rocks, gorges, canyons and picturesque sights on the Colorado River, which divides a park into four areas with its confluents.
If we look at the opposite side of the town we’ll see Arc National Park. It is also very picturesque. The blossoming cactuses in the middle of scarlet rocky cliffs look unforgettable. And the ancient Indian icons, carved on stone, attract millions of travelers. Moab is a marvelous place, where you need nothing but comfortable shoes and a lot of image memory in your camera.
","map":"place/united-states,moab"}
name: united-states-utah-moab

content:
{"annotation":" Going on a business trip or vacation to California (USA), allow time to visit the city of Monterey. An old Spanish road tends to it along the Pacific coast. 17 mile drive – highly popular guided auto route. The cozy town is located on the shores of the bay of the same name and can offer guests an unforgettable stroll around local attractions. 
The pride of Monterey is one of the largest oceanarium in the United States. Three-level transparent space allows observing underwater life of tiger sharks, moray eels, seahorses, jellyfish and other no less exotic inhabitants of the ocean. 
 The first Californian institutions survived to our time, such as theater, library, school, as well as old port constructions, deserve the attention of travelers. 
 Famous historical attractions are former school and current administration building Сolton House, the first two-story house Larkin House. 
Street Cannery Row is especially popular among tourists. Formerly waterfront was dotted with canning plants, and now there are souvenir shops, restaurants, and hotels in their place. 
In a 2-hour drive from Monterey there is a part of the technology center with the provocative name “Silicon Valley”. 
The town attracts visitors not only by historical and architectural merits. Large-scale Monterey Jazz Festival is held here every year since the late twentieth century. Jazz lovers go on it from all over the world. It is quite possible that you will be lucky enough to be its audience.
Welcome to Monterey! 
","map":"place/united-states,california,monterey"}
name: united-states-california-monterey

content:
{"annotation":" Hospitable Myrtle Beach (United States) is a real decoration of South Carolina. The resort town has many attractions and entertainment. It is a comfortable place both for alone travelers and noisy family companies. 
Myrtle Beach is famous for dozens of thematic centers, high-quality golf courses and large family parks Family Kingdom, Myrtle Beach Pavilion and Broadway at the Beach. Freestyle Music Park dedicated to hard rock failed rivalry and was closed a few years ago. 
In the city there is Myrtle Waves – a water park in the style of the Caribbean islands. It has collected more than 70 water amusement rides. Families with children should definitely visit it. 
The gift shop Gay Dolphin is recognized here as popular tourist attraction. The building has a glass tower. A spiral staircase leads to the observation deck, where the tourists discover beauty of the majestic panorama of the Atlantic Ocean. 
Guests will definitely enjoy the boardwalk Myrtle Beach. Wide wooden deck with a total length of about 2 km is located along the coastal line of the ocean. On the side opposite  the blue water the cozy cafes, restaurants and souvenir shops compactly housed.
Warm and friendly city will not allow the traveler to get bored. Monuments, museums, architectural masterpieces await their admirers. Welcome!
","map":"place/united-states,south-carolina,myrtle-beach"}
name: united-states-south-carolina-myrtle-beach
united-states-california-napa

content:
{"annotation":" Naples City (Florida) is the standard of luxury and grandeur. Choosing sunny beaches of the Gulf of Mexico, notable Americans erected suburban mansions here, opened upscale restaurant, world-class shops and golf courses. In general, they have created a quiet corner where amazing scenery pleases the eye and ring of golden coins pleases the ear. There are very few nightclubs here, but city abounds with cultural and natural attractions.
Waterpark Sun-N-Fun on the territory of North Collier Regional Park will surely attract attention of kids and adults, Teddy Bear Museum, which exhibits are more than 3000 toys, and Zoo at Caribbean Gardens.
Museums Collier Country Museum and Ah-Tha-Thi-Ki will illustrate fragments of local history. Artifacts of Indians are displayed at the exhibitions (in particular, the reconstruction of the Seminole Village).
Natural attraction Everglades National Park is famous for rare specimens of animals and birds, which found their shelter here. The multifaceted flora will introduce many varieties of orchids, ferns and other plants to guests.
In The Weatherburn Gallery you can admire the works of artists from all over the world.
At the heart of wild nature, Babcock Wilderness Adventures, it is worth to observe the behavior of panthers, bobcats, white deers, and alligators in their natural habitat (of course, if you are not afraid of being eaten). Restaurant Gator offers guests delight food.
In general, Naples City, luxury in all respects, should quicken interest of noble tourists. Welcome to the real tropical nirvana!
","map":"place/united-states,florida,naples"}
name: united-states-florida-naples

content:
{"annotation":" Nashville - the heart of the country music and the capital of Tennessee is located on the banks of the Cumberland River. It attracts tourists by numerous attractions, most of which is devoted to music.
You should start your tour of interesting places of Nashville from museums. Popular museums among tourists are: Tennessee State Museum, Lane Motor Museum, The Johnny Cash Museum, Opryland Museum and others.
Landmark The Parthenon is known in the USA by magnificent statue of Athena and a small museum, located on the 1st floor of the building. The size and beauty of the ancient Greek goddess make the visitors breathless.
It is impossible to remain indifferent, when passing by a government building Tennessee State Capitol located on a hilltop. If you want, you can go inside and see the surrounding territory.
Nashville Convention Center – a huge modern building, where business partners hold their meetings or international organizations arrange their conferences.
Leisurely stroll along the Music City Walk of Fame will leave a feeling of peace and bring back the second name of Nashville – “Music City”.
Families with children can visit the small Nashville Zoo or the Wave Country.
There are many attractions in the city. Therefore, you should see about purchasing a good camera before your trip. It will have to capture a lot of bright emotions.
","map":"place/united-states,tennessee,nashville"}
name: united-states-tennessee-nashville
united-states-louisiana-new-orleans

content:
{"annotation":" New York – city-holiday with many faces infatuates tourists with its immensity and magnificence straight away. Here every inch can boast of amazing show or reputable attraction. 
The first thing, which guests notice, is Statue of Liberty and the endless skyscrapers, holding the sky like Titans. The most famous are the Chrysler Building, Woolworth, Conde Nast. The skyscraper Empire State Building has an observation deck with a viewing angle of 360 °. 
Only aliens don’t know the longest street of the city. All others have heard this name – it is Broadway – district of round-the-clock entertainment.
Significantly educational tour to museums of New York can be arranged. Their number is countless: Underground, Brooklyn, named after Solomon Guggenheim, Cloisters and others. Here both modern cultural values and historical artifacts are collected.
Unique Brooklyn Bridge, starring in dozens of films, is considered as national landmark, an architectural masterpiece of New York. The hanging bridges Manhattan and Verrazano are no less interesting. 
Popular places to have a rest among locals and visitors are Central Park and Battery Park. Latter is famous for lots of monuments and memorials.
You definitely should visit Times Square and Rockefeller Center, stroll along the mansions of Greenwich Village.
In general, it is impossible to describe all the sights of New York City briefly and concisely. The city is a godsend for travelers and the national heritage for residents.
","map":"place/united-states,new-york,new-york-city"}
name: united-states-new-york-new-york-city
united-states-hawaii-o-ahu

content:
{"annotation":" Ocean City – resort town in Maryland occupies a narrow peninsula of the Atlantic Ocean. It's hard to find a more sophisticated town. It is impossible to go astray, because the width of the city reaches only 400 m in some places. Doors of Ocean City are always open to tourists as the main source of income.
Pedestrian waterfront Quay Boardwalk with a length of 5 km can be appreciated among the favorite attractions of guests. Souvenir shops, cafes, fish restaurants and benches, where you can sit and relax, are close-seeded along it. Free shuttles cruise around the waterfront, making a tour even more enjoyable. Here is a monument to firefighters, who died in the line of duty in New York in 2001.
Amusement parks are in demand among travelers: Trimper's Rides (1893), Six Flags of America and the Jolly Roger at The Pier. Excellent places to have a rest for the whole family.
You can get much pleasure from visiting a huge water park Splash Mountain. Unbelievable exhibits, exhibitions, various festivals await tourists at the museum Ripleys Believe It Or Not Museum.
In general, it is quiet cozy town, where you can get away from the bustle of the metropolis, admire the ocean and take a walk through the souvenir shops. By the way, the prices are ridiculous that is unusual for a resort paradise.
","map":"place/united-states,new-jersey,ocean-city"}
name: united-states-new-jersey-ocean-city

content:
{"annotation":" Oklahoma City – the capital of the district of the United States of the same name like Venice or Amsterdam attracts tourists with its unusual water channel. Locals and tourists stroll along the waterfront every day. Lovers of water transport can take a taxi and go for a tour along the fashionable districts to the city center.
One of the attractions of the capital is a symbolic monument of over 100 m in length, consisting of 45 human figures. It describes the history of origin of Oklahoma City.
The city is famous for its numerous museums: museum of natural science (Museum of Osteology), specialized historical museum (Western Heritage Museum), museum of science (Science Museum Oklahoma) and others.
The pride of the city is the natural center – Martin Park and Botanic Garden – Myriad Botanical Gardens.
Davell center – the first skyscraper. Its construction was ended in 1927. Besides it, the famous skyscrapers are Tower Chase, City Place Tower, SandRidge Center and others. The highest and youngest is Devon Tower (2012) equipped with an observation deck.
Prestigious Overholser Mansion, Bricktown district with historical monuments and picturesque pond, is worthy of tourists’ attention.
Everyone who wants can capture the perfect image of himself on the background of the most beautiful city government building – State Capitol.
It is impossible to see all attractions of Oklahoma City even for a month. There is something interesting at every step. You will not be able to leave hold of camera.
Conclusion: Nice, cozy, sunny city is definitely worthy to be its guest!
 ","map":"place/united-states,oklahoma,oklahoma-city"}
name: united-states-oklahoma-oklahoma-city

content:
{"annotation":" The city of Orlando is located in the southern continent USA state – Florida. Thanks to warm and humid subtropical climate there are a lot of parks in the city and around it.
One of the most famous parks in the United States, Walt Disney World Resort, is located southwest of Orlando. This park was built as an alternative to Disneyland for Americans, living in the eastern part of the country. One of the main attractions of the park, Cinderella's Castle, is its symbol and hallmark.
In Orlando there are two world-famous theme parks – the park “Holy Land” and the Marine Zoo-Oceanarium “Sea World”. The park “Holy Land” shows expositions on biblical themes, and in the “Sea World” you will meet with marine mammals and birds.
Museums of Orlando are very interesting. Here is one of the most unusual museums in the United States – museum of trains and trams. The museum presents models of railway transport beginning with the 20s of last century. Also it is interesting to visit the Museum of American Art and Orlando Museum of Art.
In Orlando you can book a tour to the most famous American launch site on the Cape Canaveral. The trip takes only 1 hour and the guided tour includes a visit to the Kennedy Space Center, Space Hall of Fame and a tour to launching pads.
","map":"place/united-states,florida,orlando"}
name: united-states-florida-orlando

content:
{"annotation":" Palm Springs is the largest city located in the California desert. It was founded as a health resort situated in an oasis in the midst of the endless sands.
Today Palm Springs is fashionable resort. The city has many five-star hotels, and about 100 courses are equipped for golfers in the suburbs. Central streets of Palm Springs are Palm Canyon and Indian Canyon, a great place for shopping – there are many boutiques of famous brands.
But the city is famous not only for its luxurious establishments. In Palm Springs there are some museums, which are worth a visit: Agua Caliente Cultural Museum, which expositions describe the history and culture of the Indians of Cahuilla, Desert Museum, as well as a very unusual museum “1930s General Store Museum”, interior of the last century has fully preserved in it. Here in the shop window you can see the products, which were popular among Americans during the Great Depression.
Since the city is located in the immediate vicinity of the Cordillera, tours in this mountainous area are very popular. Canyons of Palm and Andreas with their scenic views are especially attractive to tourists.
","map":"place/united-states,california,palm-springs"}
name: united-states-california-palm-springs

content:
{"annotation":" Panama City Beach is a small town in the USA state of Florida. As is seen from the name of the city, its main attractions are beaches.
Wide shoreland of white sand and warm waters of the Gulf of Mexico have made Panama City Beach one of the favorite holiday destinations in the United States. That is the place, where students and seniors of American educational institutions located in the east of the country come to spend spring break. It is easy to explain such popularity of this resort among young people – it has everything for an active holiday. You can surf, scuba diving or parasailing (kind of activity, when a person flies up in the air with a parachute attached to the boat and moves through the air behind it). Also, there is a kart track in the city.
And for those, who prefer calm activities, there are also many things to do in Panama City Beach. The town has a beautiful aquarium, which presents inhabitants of the Gulf of Mexico, and a museum, which displays the expositions based on deception of view.
Fishing will be another great pastime in the city. You can go fishing near the bridge, which divides the city into two parts, and you can rent a boat and go for prey in the waters of the bay. But in both cases positive emotions and considerable catch are guaranteed for you!
","map":"place/united-states,florida,panama-city-beach"}
name: united-states-florida-panama-city-beach

content:
{"annotation":" Philadelphia is one of the oldest cities in the United States and in addition the first capital of the American State. The city has many attractions associated with the history of the United States.
In Philadelphia Independence Hall is located, the building, in which the Declaration of Independence and the Constitution of the United States of America were passed. Next to the building there is the famous Liberty Bell, which ringing announced the origin of a new state in 1776.
In Philadelphia there are buildings of the First and Second Bank of the United States. There is also the house of Betsy Rose, where the first American flag was created. In the historic center of Philadelphia there are more than 30 houses built in the late 18th – early 19th century. Here is the church of St. George, which was once visited by George Washington and Benjamin Franklin.
Besides historical attractions Philadelphia has several museums, which curious tourists should visit. First of all, it is a museum of medical pathologies – an unforgettable sight for impressionable tourists. Also, in the city there is a worldwide famous Philadelphia Museum of Art, where works by such famous artists as Picasso and Renoir are collected. Very interesting expositions are presented in the museum of Archaeology and Anthropology of University of Pennsylvania. Here you will find many ancient artifacts from Egypt and Mesopotamia.
And in Philadelphia there is the oldest zoo in the United States, it will be interesting to see it both for children and adults.
","map":"place/united-states,pennsylvania,philadelphia"}
name: united-states-pennsylvania-philadelphia

content:
{"annotation":" Although American state of Tennessee has no outlet to the sea and is not surrounded by picturesque mountains, here there is one of the most popular resorts in the southeastern United States – Pigeon Forge.
The city has become famous thanks to the huge amusement park – Dollywood named in honor of the popular country performer Dolly Parton. The park has many attractions, including water slides and a dizzying rollercoaster. And besides that, the park has a reserve, old chapel and museum of Dolly Parton.
Another no less popular attraction of Pigeon Forge is museum of rock'n'roll king – Elvis Presley. Fans of the great singer will see the largest collection of items, which Elvis owned at one time.
In the city there is an unusual museum, which is called "Journey into the Unknown." It is an inverted house, which was moved from the Bermuda Triangle by typhoon, according to the legend. Also in this city without sea there is the largest museum of ship “Titanic”.
Pigeon Forge is famous for its restaurants, which present cuisine of the southeast United States. Meat dishes dominate in the local cuisine, and in restaurants of the city you can enjoy a great steak or tender chicken meat.
 ","map":"place/united-states,tennessee,pigeon-forge"}
name: united-states-tennessee-pigeon-forge

content:
{"annotation":" The second largest city in Pennsylvania, Pittsburgh, started its history from the Fort Pitt, which was founded by John Forbes in 1758. It happened during the Anglo-French wars in America.
The most important attraction of Pittsburgh is the “Golden Triangle”. This is historical city center located at the confluence of the Allegheny and Monongaela Rivers. The most full-flowing confluent of the Mississippi, the river Ohio, stems from here. In this place modern skyscrapers coexist with well-preserved 19th-century buildings. Also, there is the U.S. Steel Tower – the highest building of Pittsburgh, which height is 256 meters.
In the western part there is the Point State Park, it was laid out at the place of the ruins of Fort Pitt, which gave the city its name. The museum of the same name is also located there.
And the most famous museum of Pittsburgh is Carnegie Museum of Natural History. It presents skeletons of various dinosaurs, as well as the expositions of rare minerals. Also, in the city there is one of the most popular pop art museums in the world devoted to creative work of Andy Warhol.
Do not forget that one of the names of Pittsburgh – the city of bridges. It is believed that Pittsburgh ranks first in America by the number of these structures and the third in the world after Venice and Hamburg. The city has 445 bridges in total.
","map":"place/united-states,pennsylvania,pittsburgh"}
name: united-states-pennsylvania-pittsburgh

content:
{"annotation":" Portland City or, as it is called “the city of roses”, is located in the American state of Oregon and is considered as one of the greenest cities in the USA. In the city there are a lot of parks, and comfortable layout of Portland makes it one of the most comfortable cities to live in the USA.
The most famous parks in Portland are Tom McCall Park, which walking area is more than 3 km, Washington Park, which is located in an arboretum, Japanese garden and a zoo. Near lake Crystal Springs there is one of the most beautiful parks in the city with rhododendron garden. In Portland there is the smallest park in the world, Mill Ends, which consists of one spruce and is located at the corner of Taylor Street and Southwest Front Avenue.
Among the hardscape buildings there is very popular Esplanade Istbank, which offers a great view of the historic city center. In the historic center of Portland there are plenty of buildings of the early 20th century, and Portland Building is considered as the most famous. On the building Portlandia is erected – copper sculpture of a woman with trident of 10 meters high. It is on the second place for its size in North America, it is inferior only to the Statue of Liberty. Portlandia was installed on the building in 1985. 
","map":"place/united-states,oregon,portland"}
name: united-states-oregon-portland

content:
{"annotation":" Only few people know that in the early 20th century a small town in the state of Nevada – Reno was the gambling capital of the United States, not Las Vegas. Although Reno yielded the palm, the town remains very attractive to gamblers. Because there are many attractions in Reno besides gambling, which you should visit.
First of all, it's Automobile Museum. More than 200 models of cars will be represented for your attention. The collection includes cars of such celebrities as Elvis Presley, John F. Kennedy, Frank Sinatra, and John Wayne.
Campus of University of Nevada and the Central Library of the city are particularly noteworthy. The campus was built in the style of Jefferson University in Virginia. Here you can book an interesting tour with a visit to the planetarium. A Central Library of Reno is famous because it is located in a small park.
In Reno there are many places for active recreation both in summer and winter. Around the city there are many ski resorts, golf courses, and in the city there is the country-park with the area of 570 acres, where water rides are situated. The annual race of balloons held here at the end of the summer.
","map":"place/united-states,nevada,reno"}
